choices: Try it out on yourself right now
Go find your mother
Find one of your sisters
You remember that Bianca, your girlfriend, is coming over later
Maybe it's best to put this away until later....
1.content:
BEEP!BEEP!BEEP!BEEP!

You jolt awake as the alarm on your phone pulls you from sleep. What time is it? You look at the time.

8am? You don't remember setting the alarm for that time, especially with today being sunday, a day off. You grumble as you prepare to go back to sleep, or try to, anyway. But as you lie back down, you notice a weird glow on your desk. What is that?

Annoyed, you get out of bed and walk over to the glow. When you get there you find a remote. Odd, you don't remember seeing anything like this before, why would it be in your bedroom?

The glow was from it's LED screen, which simply read '100%'. There were two buttons on it's face, a large blue button and a smaller red button below it. From inspecting it, it seems like these are the only features of the entire thing, only making things more confusing. What could this be used for? Curious, you hit the blue button.

BRRRRRZZZTTTT!!!!!

A Beam of light shoots out of the remote and hits your desk. You jump back in surprise as your desk glows for a second, before vanishing from sight. What just happened? Your desk is gone? You lean in to look at where it used to be, and after about a minute of investigating, you see it.

There's your desk, same as it was, only now it's incredibly small! It can't be any bigger than a centimetre, if that! You look back at the remote, the LED now reading 60%. You point the remote and aim as carefully you can at your small target of a desk, and try hitting the red button.

BRRRRRZZZTTTT!!!!!

And then, as quick as it disappeared, your desk is back, at normal size.

Adrenaline shoots through you as you look at the remote, now reading 35%. The things you can do and get up to with this remote begin shooting through your mind. You're so excited you want to try it out now. As you see the battery change to 36%, you realise that it auto charges as well. Maybe you should wait for it to recharge before getting up to no good?
1.title: An Early Start

choices: Your mom walks in
Jacqueline comes in, looking for you
Your Girlfriend makes a surprise visit
Naomi enters, wanting to play something
11.content:
It's no use. You're too excited to wait for this thing to recharge, for all you know it could take hours. Heck, you don't even know the most important part yet, does it work on people?

With nobody likely to enter your room for at least a few hours, you willingly volunteer yourself to be the first test subject for this experiment. With your hands shaking, you point the remote at your chest and press the blue button.

BRRRRRZZZTTTT!!!!!

You immediately are overwhelmed by an intense sense of vertigo, and close your eyes to try and stifle the dizziness. After a few seconds you regain yourself, and open your eyes.

Oh my god.

Your surround by a seemingly endless amount of coiled trees, and not small trees either, it'd most likely take you a few minutes of climbing to reach the top. You're able to piece from context that this awe-inspiring vista was once your bedroom carpet. You're incredibly tiny! You can't be much bigger than a millimetre or two! You didn't mean to this far!

You look at the remote, which shrunk with you (Along with your clothes, thankfully). The LED reads 3%, pretty much empty. You doubt that'd get you back to your original size, so it looks like your stuck at this size for now. You begin to walk around your new world, unable to see any of the other features of your bedroom past the canopy of carpet fibres. Looking to get your bearings, you decide to climb the nearest one. Reaching it, the task looks a lot more difficult than you thought, you really underestimated how big it was! Nevertheless, with few options, you begin to climb it anyway, luckily it's easy with so many footholds along the way.

You couldn't have been halfway up when you hear a noise that makes your blood run cold.

BANG!BANG!BANG!

You head shoots in the direction of the sound, it's hard to tell due to the noises being amplified so much, but you think that was the sound of someone knocking on your door! Which would be incredibly bad if somebody was to enter your room with you at this size!

CREEEEEAAAKKKK!!!!

It turns out that whoever it was wasn't waiting for a response, and decided to enter your room anyway! But you still can't quite make it out who it is!

Who is it?
11.title: No time like the present!

choices: Run Away!
Try to climb the sandal wall
Stay put and watch
111.content:
Your eyes widen as you see the incredibly huge form of your mother walk into your room! You can't believe just how big she is at this scale, usually she's not that tall at all! You cling as tightly as you can to your carpet fibre as your mothers steps, which while casual to her, cause what feels like an apocalypse to you down on the floor! With each booming step, you can see the what is usually microscopic dust particles thrown off of the carpet, sending them what seems like miles into the air, all the way to about halfway up the sole of the flip-flop your mom is currently wearing.

The earthquakes only get more and more intense as your mother steps further into the room, and gets closer and closer to your location with each step! Before you know it she's almost right on top of you! You're terrified as you've never experienced something this otherworldly huge and fast before! There's a very real chance of you getting stepped on and left as a small red dot on your mother's dirty old sandal! But, fortunately for you, the walking Goddess stops just before she reaches you.

You regain your balance on the carpet and look towards your mother. Instead of seeing her, however, you are greeted with what seems to be a several mile high wall of black rubber. Craning your head all the way back, you can see five moving gigantic spheres on top of the wall, each one making it's own BOOM! noise as it fidgets about. You can figure out that you've been inadvertently spared, and are left in the shadow of your moms sandal! You desperately want to cry out for help, and for your mother to save you, but you know that there's no chance of her hearing you.

What do you do?
111.title: The Mother of all Mothers

choices: Her toes start fidgeting!
She starts to move!
"HMM?" Did she actually feel that?
1112.content:
You try not to think about how close you just came to being crushed underneath your mothers feet, and start running towards the great wall of rubber that is your mom's sandal. You don't know how long she is planning on staying here, and the longer that you're on the floor the higher the chances of you ending up underneath her feet. You try glancing up to get a hint about it from her actions, but it's no use, she's too far away to tell what she's doing.

You reach the base of the sandal, and are thankful that it didn't take that long to get there (In reality, your mothers foot was only a centimetre from you, it was really close!). You place your hand onto the rubber, and it looks like you'll be actually be able to climb this immeasurable wall!.....somehow.
"Well, no time to waste." You muse to yourself, and begin to scramble up the sandal as fast as you can.

As you climb, you can feel the ominous booms and thumping of your mothers mountainous toes above you through the sandal, was this really the best idea? One wrong move and you'd end up underneath them, plus who knows what'll happen when she actually starts moving. Regardless, you still think that it's better to stay up on higher ground, so to speak. And if worse comes to worse, you could try and hide by the area where the strap is.

Eventually you reach the summit, and roll onto the surface of the sandal. Instantly you feel dwarfed again as you're reminded of your new tiny size, as you stare up at the dominating forms of your mothers toes. The one in front of you is the size of one of the high rises you'd see in the city, but it's in reality just mom's pinky toe! There'd be no way to survive it if you ended up beneath it, but fortunately it seems like they're being rather still at the moment. Dangerously curious, you move closer to the toe to investigate it.

You reach the toe, and place one hand on it and rub it on the surface a little. It feels coarser than you would have expected. You've never been one to check out women's feet, but you would have thought that your mom's feet were softer and smoother than this. Perhaps it's because of your size, and that there was no way to hide it at this scale? When she first entered and walked into your room, you could see much more cracks and wrinkles on her feet than you normally could. On top of this, the smell was....interesting. Best described as a mix between sweat and foot lotion. It didn't help that the sandal also contained it's own unique smell as well, but for some reason you didn't mind it too much, perhaps because of it's familiarity in this new and impossible world you were a part of.

You stand there, absentmindedly touching your mothers toe for a while.
1112.title: Scaling the Rubber Wall

choices: You landed on top of a toe
You landed under a toe
You landed in between the toes
11121.content:
Your absent-minded toe rubbing is suddenly interrupted when you're suddenly smacked by the very tow you were rubbing and sent flying! You're sent flying into the air from the force and lose all control over where you're going and where you're going to land! You try your best to get your bearings during this, but all you could make out is the rapidly rising wall that was formerly your mom's toe. Then, as quickly as it raised, it shot back down towards the surface of the sandal. Impacting the ground with a muffled *THUD!* and small shaking.

You stay in the air for a few more seconds before crashing back onto the surface of the sandal, tumbling down to about the centre of the footwear, thankfully for you just in front of the toes. You move to stand up but are immediately sent sprawling to the ground again as a similar *THUD!* noise and quake ring out, knocking you off balance. Before you can recover from this, another one occurs. You aren't sure what's happening but you're powerless to resist it!

Choosing to stay on the ground, you look up to try and get an idea of what is happening. You are greeted with the terrifying sight of each monstrous toe rising miles above you into the air before crashing down into the ground and repeating. The speed at which this is all happening is mind-boggling to you, it's enough to make you freeze in fear of these organic mountains that in reality are just the toes of mom's usually petite feet. You look further up past the toes, to try and make out what she's doing, but you're still much too far away to make out any of her details. What you didn't know is that none of this was intentional, it was just the unconscious wiggling of her toes causing this cataclysmic event in your world.

Not daring to move, you're content to wait at this distance and hope that the toes stop these movements sometime soon, before mom begins walking again. Your hopes are dashed, however after the toe closest to you, her middle toe, hits the ground with slightly more force than the previous times. A change that was unnoticeable to a normal person, but a world ending disaster to you. This time, the toe causes a thundering *BOOM!* as it meets the ground, and the force is enough to send you flying into the air again, despite your attempts to resist it! While normally this would have launched you back into the carpet forest, mom's foot makes the smallest shift forward, and you scream as her foot launches forward towards you at lightning speeds!

You smack into another surface, but where have you ended up?
11121.title: Reflexes

choices: Mom starts walking somewhere!
You start moving in a direction, hoping to get out!
Something disastrous happens!
111212.content:
Just before the never-ending wall of toe crashes into you, it suddenly lifts slightly and instead you stare deep into the abyss that is the underside of your mom's foot! You flail aimlessly as the toe looms over you before coming down suddenly from above!

Fortunately for you, you weren't crushed instantly underneath your mother's toe. You weren't sure if it was because it missed or if you were just too small for it to matter, but you weren't complaining. The more pressing concern for you at the moment was the fact that you were now stuck somewhere under the sole of your mother's foot, and you couldn't tell where because the entire area was completely dark!

Effectively blind, you take a couple of steps forward, trying to feel out your new location. The smell outside was faint but noticeable, here deep inside the sandal the smell is overpowering and relentless. You try to block it by covering your nose but it does nothing to slow it down, you'll just have to bear with it until you can get out of here.

Suddenly, a booming noise erupts around the area, and the ground shakes too. This must be her toes moving about again, but they're much further away from last time you were near these quakes. You don't have the time to ponder this however, as you were knocked off balance and stumble over!

You face-plant onto the 'ground' and recoil in surprise as you land in a puddle of water! Water splashes up onto you as you recoil back in surprise at the unexpected liquid. The smell coming from the liquid is somehow even worse than the smell permeating the area! It doesn't take a genius to figure out you just covered yourself with a small pool of your mom's foot sweat! You splutter and cough, trying to get the taste out of your mouth, cringing in embarrassment at being drenched and accidentally swallowing some of mom's sweat. You swear to yourself to keep this experience a secret.

Picking yourself up, you try to dry yourself off but struggle to in the darkness. You can feel the smell of sweat cling to your body, and resolve to go get a shower ASAP.

That's when...
111212.title: A Dark Tomb

choices: You reach solid ground
You drown in the sweat sea
1112123.content:
Just as you regain your footing, the entire ground quakes tremendously! The shaking is on a much more extreme level than the simple toe quakes that you've been dealing with up until now! It's so intense that despite your best efforts, it still causes you to stumble and fall, back into the puddle of sweat!

You roll over and try to wipe the fragrant liquid off of your face again, but for the second time you taste the salty refuse. Grossed out, you gag as a reflex to the thought of accidentally drinking foot sweat for a second time. You decide to get out and away from this puddle before another quake sends you in for a third helping, but before you can pick yourself up your leg suddenly gets hit with a quick stinging sensation.

You look at your leg as you feel another small spike of pain on the side of your thigh. The only thing near your leg is the remote that's still in your pocket, so you pull the remote out to look at it. Your face goes pale as you see the screen that should usually be indicating the battery level going haywire, displaying numbers and symbols seemingly at random. Did you fall on it and break it? Or maybe it's not waterproof and some of your mom's sweat has short circuited it? Whatever the reason, if the remote breaks you're pretty much screwed!

As you're thinking these worrying thoughts the remote sends out another quick jolt of electricity, enough to cause you to drop it on instinct. This would prove incredibly costly as it turns out the remote did in fact still have some charge left in it, which you quickly discover as the remote activates, firing directly at you as it bounces off of the ground! Your blood turns cold as your vision is blinded by the same white light!

*BZZZZZZZZZTTTTTTTT!!!!!!!!*

....

You suddenly feel like you're in a freefall. You cannot make out wherever it is that you're falling as the environment is still dark, but your worst fears have been realised as the remote didn't hit you with the beam to regrow! You've been shrunken a second time, only now the remote didn't come with you!

*SPLASH!*

You're caught off guard as you make impact with a body of water and submerge what feels like a dozen metres downwards. You're thankful that you didn't hurt anything when you hit the water as you desperately attempt to swim in the direction that you think the surface is. Your lungs beginning to burn, you finally make it to the surface as you take in deep breaths, treading water.

You couldn't have been there for more than a couple of seconds when suddenly you're blindsided by a crashing wave, sending you rolling back under the water! In your surprise, you accidentally swallow some of the water, and you taste a familiar, warm salty taste in your mouth.

Foot sweat.

What to your mother is an unnoticeable drop of sweat from her foot on her sandal, and to the shrunken you was a small pool of sweat, has now become an entire deep ocean of your mother's perspiration! If you had time to panic rather than swim for your life you would have curled up into a ball. You were imperceptibly microscopic! The you from a minute ago would most likely be several miles tall in comparison, not to mention however unthinkably large your mother's foot, much less her entire body is now compared to you! And what's worse is that without the remote, you are now permanently stuck at this size, with no hope of ever being found or rescued!

You resurface for a second time, and are promptly dumped by another wave and sent back under. The puddle that seemed still before, is now raging with the quakes from your mothers toes and footsteps, keeping you from getting a break from this fight for your life! Nevertheless, you struggle, determined to survive this, as you pick a direction and move that way, praying that it's the closest path towards dry land.

What happens next?
1112123.title: A Speck to a Speck

choices: She steps forward!
You try to get her attention!
"NOPE, HE'S NOT HERE." Someone else is here?
1113.content:
The sight of your mother, who usually isn't that tall, who hasn't been taller than you since middle school this big is one of the most intimidating things you've ever seen! It doesn't help that you haven't had that much time to adjust to your new size yet, but her extreme size, mixed with her extreme speed and her unintentional yet overwhelming power leaves you too scared to move!

You stare wordlessly at your mother, mouth agape. She's dressed casually, only in shorts and a t-shirt, and even at your scale you can tell that this doesn't include a bra. It must be another lazy sunday for her. But then why is she here in your room this early? You can't even tell what she's looking at, her breasts serving to block any view of her face. Suddenly, as if answering you request, Mom leans forward slightly, giving you a small view of the top of her face. However, you still can't tell what her intentions are.

"Do something." You mutter. "I-I need to do something!" You try to motivate yourself into action!

That's when...
1113.title: Scared Stiff

choices: Front
Back
11133.content:
"that's all of the kids gone, now that we're alone why don't we have some fun?" Your mom said to your father
"Way ahead of you honey" your father said as he started taking his shirt off
"You go wait on the bed and I'll meet you in there with something special on. Just let me grab it, I'll change in Ethan's room and come in." With that your mom left to her room with your dad, than returned shortly after with her "surprise" for dad, a white lace lingerie dress and a matching thong. "I've been waiting all month for him to get back so I could show this off" she said as she dropped the lingerie on the floor, right on top of you, as she changed out of her clothes. She put the dress on first and grabbed the thong, and you realized you were stuck to it. As she said it up her body you saw you were stuck to the...
11133.title: "NOPE, HE'S NOT HERE."

choices: Yes, and land on the foot of the bed
No, time to join the "fun"
111331.content:
As you were pulled up you saw that you were stuck to the front of the thong, and worse, you were stuck to the inside of it. Your mom pulled up the thong fully and let it snap shut, which dislodged you, right into her unshaven bush. You felt your mom start walking and tried to free your self, only to tangle yourself in her pupic hair. You can see through the Lacy material enough to see that your mom just got to her room and started to open the door
"Wow, You went all out for me didn't you? Come here so I can take that off of you and have some fun" you could see that your dad was nacked on top of the bed, and has an erection.
"I'll start to take these of then" You hear your mom say as she slides her thong off slowly, teasing your dad, and throws them at his face. You redouble your efforts to escape as she starts walking closer to the bed. As she reaches it, she gets on all fours and slowly crawls up to meet your dad...
Do you escape her pubes?
111331.title: Inside the front

choices: She sits on your bed to wait for you
Mom comes in to talk to her
She steps towards you!
113.content:
You can hardly believe what you're looking at as the towering form of what appears to be Bianca thunders into your room! What's she doing here so early? Never mind that, she's huge! You've always been so used to Bianca being so much shorter than you, heck Naomi was nearly reaching her height, but right now she's the biggest human to have ever existed, or at least at your scale she is!

You can do nothing but cling to your carpet fibre on the ground as you watch Bianca walk into your room, her footsteps causing earthquakes across the room, and making thunderous noises as well. You look towards her feet to see them in her favourite pair of platform sandals, blowing small bits of dust from the ground high into the air, where it was sent flying by her leg movements. You sigh at the sight of them. She usually wore them to gain a few inches of height on you, but at this scale it's more like adding a few miles onto her!

Eventually the booming steps cease as you look up towards Bianca's upper body. You can't make out the details too well, but you think she's looking for you, judging by the movements of her hair flipping around at rapid speeds. You can't confirm this, however, as Bianca's rather ample cleavage is blocking all sight you have of her face! For the first time in your life you curse her massive mammaries.

"ETHAN? YOU HERE? HELLOOOOOOO?" Your Goddess girlfriends voice rings out across the room. Not seeing you, she adjusts her top a little, giving you a show as her mountainous breasts bounce around.

Looks like you guessed right. Bianca was looking for you, but bar being a psychic there's no way she'd actually find you like this. With the remote still on low charge, it seems like you'll have to either get Bianca's attention or avoid her for a while, but both seem pretty impossible for you at the moment!

What's Bianca's next move?
113.title: The Giga-Girlfriend

choices: Mom's feet move over you!
The two women stand there chatting for a bit
*Ping!* The Remote's recharged!
1132.content:
You were still staring up at Bianca, mouth agape like a fish, when suddenly your entire world began to undergo yet another series of constant violent earthquakes and tremors, a sensation that you were thankfully beginning to adjust to ever so slightly. Nevertheless, you still clung tightly to your position, to keep yourself from falling back down into the depths of the carpet if you were to be knocked off balance.

Looking up, Bianca didn't seem to have moved at all, you could see the pale mountains that were her toes wiggling around on her sandals far above you, but the booms coming from them shouldn't be as intense as the ones you're feeling. No, these ones were more like when Bianca first entered your room, the feeling of her earth-shaking footsteps. Luckily for you your questions were soon answered.

"BIANCA?" A thundering voice rang out from across the heavens. It seemed to come from every direction, as if it truly was the voice of God speaking to you (Or rather Bianca) at this very moment. Although despite the volume increase, you recognised the owner of that voice.

And you were correct, as you can spot approaching in the distance a pair of monolithic bare feet thundering their way into your room.
______________________

"Hmm? Oh! Hi Ethan's Mom! Was I too loud just then?" Bianca asks apologetically, her feet fidgeting slightly in embarrassment.

Kathy smiled, shaking her head.
"It's fine dear. And besides, didn't I tell you that you could just call me by my name last time?" She said, crossing her arms across her chest.

"Ehehe, sorry! I guess I just thought that would be too casual..." Bianca giggled, before her eyes lit up.
"Oh yeah! Have you seen Ethan anywhere? He's not in here, and that's usually where he's hiding." She asked excitedly.

"He's not here?" Kathy responded just as confused, before looking around the room and confirming this. "That's odd, I haven't seen him all morning, so I thought he'd still be in here."

"Aww." Bianca's shoulders drooped slightly, her chest bouncing. "I guess I'll just stay up here and wait for him to come back."

"I'm sorry about this, making you wait for him like this. It's a good thing he's not here or I'd embarrass him with a lecture about how to treat his girlfriend properly!" She chuckled.

"Hey, don't be too harsh on him!" Bianca responded, joining her in laughter.
____________

While the two Titanic women laughed above, you were frozen, unsure about what your next action possibly could be.

At this size, you had little hope of actually being able to avoid one of the girls, let alone two at the same time! If they decide to start moving there's really nothing you can do to stop them or slow them down in the slightest. Not only this, but with the two of them chatting like this, getting their attention has shifted from nigh impossible to flat out impossible, too. Your options are fairly limited, although....

This is a once in a lifetime opportunity to get closer to one of these women then you've ever been before, and without them even being aware of it! You'd just need enough time and an opportunity to get closer to one of them...

What happens next?
1132.title: The Two Goddesses

choices: You decide to regrow yourself
You point the remote at one of the women and fire!
11323.content:
Your rushed and panicked thoughts, mixed with the thundering noises of the conversation occurring miles above you are suddenly drowned out by a quick, ear piercing noise, along with a strong vibration coming from your pocket. Reaching your hand in, you pull out the remote, and are shocked to see that it already reads 100%! That was fast!

You breathe a huge sigh of relief. Thank goodness! Now you can regrow yourself back to normal size! Sure, you'll definitely give your Mom and Bianca the surprise of their lives when you suddenly spring forth from the depths of the carpet, but you'll definitely prefer explaining that over ending up squashed underneath their feet!

You aim the remote at yourself and prepare to fire, only.... there's a small thought in your mind telling you not to be so hasty. Looking back up at the gargantuan figures, their feet and shoes dwarfing you easily, this small thought rapidly grows into an immense temptation.

What if... you were to shrink one of the women down to your size instead? You'd love to see how they'd both react to one of them suddenly shrinking down to a microscopic size, and they'd be totally safe (mostly) since the other would see what had happened! Besides, it wouldn't hurt to have some company down here in the case you were able to locate the shrinkee in this carpet jungle.

You contemplate your options a little more, before....
11323.title: Charged and Ready

choices: Naomi sits on the floor and waits for you
Naomi starts snooping around your room!
Naomi's upset, she starts having a small tantrum!
114.content:
You can't see who it is walking through the door, but you sure can feel them! In fact, it doesn't feel like they're walking at all! Your entire world feels like the apocalypse is coming, as everything is shaking violently to match the rhythm of the *BOOM!**BOOM!**BOOM!**BOOM!* of the giant's footsteps! Eventually it gets too much for you and you lose your grip on the carpet fibre and fall all the way back down to the bottom!

You hit the ground after a couple of seconds, and for he most part you're relatively fine, despite being winded for a second on impact. You're slightly thankful for the fall however, as it meant that you could avoid being made sick from the earthquakes for a moment. But when, you pick yourself up, the quakes had already stopped for the moment anyway. Which is when a voice rings out.

"BIG BRO? I THOUGHT YOU WERE IN HERE?" A voice that could definitely only be Naomi's booms across everything. You already had guessed it was her due to the fast paced footsteps, but at least now you know the source for sure. Her voice sounds almost as loud as her steps, and you could both hear and feel it echo around you in the carpet forest, so you're slightly afraid of seeing the size your small younger sister would be now. You try to look around.

You can see the various carpet fibre trees, of course. But now there's a huge wall towering above them. That wasn't there before, could Naomi be responsible for it? You're answer is given to you as suddenly the wall flies up and then straight down suddenly! You're thrown backwards with the shockwave as a humongous *THUD!* rings out! You realise as you fly back that wasn't something Naomi brought, that wall was Naomi! It had to have been one of her toes! You're almost impossibly tiny!

"BIG BRO...WHERE ARE YOU? I WANNA PLAY SOMETHING!" Naomis shouts, slightly deafening you, even from this distance. You cover your ears as you look up at your little sister.

What's Naomi's next move?
114.title: A Big Little Girl

choices: You land on top of Naomi's head
You land on one of Naomi's legs
You land on Naomi's shirt
1141.content:
Naomi huffed to herself. Where the heck was her big brother? She got up early and everything too! And when she gets to his room he's nowhere to be found! Well, that wasn't going to stop her. She's going to rope him into playing something with her whether he wants to or not. And until that happens, she's not going to leave this room! And with that, she dropped onto the ground and started to wait, stretching her legs out as she did so.

For you however, it was as if the sky was falling. The humongous form of your baby sister started to rapidly head towards the ground, and although you were thankfully nowhere near the impact point, you knew that the aftershocks from it were going to be immense! With nowhere else to run or to move, your only option for cover was to huddle up as close to the nearest carpet fibre as you could and hope that it shields you from what's about to happen.

*BOOOOOOOOMMMMMMMMMMM!!!!!!!*

Everything shakes violently with a force that makes the previous shakes from her footsteps seem like light shakes by comparison! You stood absolutely no chance as you're instantly knocked away from your carpet shelter as you are thrown around in what feels like every direction! Your head is spinning as you seemingly bounce and tumble in every direction!

Then, the shockwave of air that was rushed out from Naomi sitting reaches you. The air current picks you up with ease as you are carried miles and miles into the air! The forest of the carpet becomes a far away land as it rapidly moves further and further away from you! You were tumbling and flying high into the air now, and soon the forces acting on your miniscule body become too much as they finally overcome your senses and you pass out.

.....

You wake up after who knows how long, face down on an unfamiliar surface. Where did you land?
1141.title: Knocked Skyward

choices: To watch TV
To a friends house
To the bathroom
11412.content:
Getting your bearings straight, you take a look around at your surroundings. Looking to your left, you see nothing but miles of flesh colored landscape with many bumpy hills. Did you somehow end up in a desert? That didn't seem possible... Turning around you see a large black cave with an even darker cave opening and above that a long pillar of white. Giving your head a few slaps to make sure you're awake your thoughts are interrupted from the heavens.

"I"M BOOOOOOORED!"

That deafeningly loud voice sounded really familiar, you rack your brain around what had just happened when it dawned on you. You must have crashed onto Naomi! 12211.content:
You look back and forth, trying to determine which one of your mother's feet is the closest to your location. You've decided to take advantage of the situation and get a little closer, and you need the quickest path up before she moves again. Her right foot is slightly closer to you currently, but she is slightly tapping it on the floor, making a soft *BOOM* noise and a small shake of the ground with each impact. You decide that it would be safer to go the extra distance for the more stable left foot.

You begin to run towards her foot, as you have a lot of distance to cover and not that much time to get there. You're unaware of this, but your mother had finished peeing before you even began to run, and you've lucked out as she's continued to sit on the toilet and think to herself for a while, giving you this opportunity. After a couple of minutes of running, you finally reach the base of her foot.

The sight of mom's foot is somehow even more intimidating at this close range than it was when it was moving. Although you know what you're looking at, it's so big that it looks unrecognisable, and is just a seemingly endless wall of skin in every direction. The area also has a distinct smell too, which you could detect from a distance before you arrived up close, but is now much stronger as you move to touch the foot. Looking up, you see that you should be able to climb up fairly quickly using the slight wrinkles and cracks across it, a sign of ageing and years of use that are impossible to hide at this scale. Deciding not to waste anymore time staring at a foot when there are greater sights to see, you grab onto a makeshift handhold made of skin, and begin to climb.

The climb was much harder than you had originally given it credit for, but you managed to run up the top of her foot when you got there and have reached her ankle in fairly good time. At this point, you've finally reached a part of the object of your desire, the former sky that was your mom's underwear. The fabric is rolled up in a bunch slightly around her ankle, meaning that you'd have to do some tricky manoeuvring in order to get on top of it and into it. You aren't sure how much longer mom will sit still so you move to climb the threads of the panties.

Suddenly, as if on cue, everything begins the shake! You manage to look up to see the hands of your new Goddess reaching down, most likely to pull what you've been climbing for far out of your reach! If that was to happen you'd be stuck on her ankle too while she was moving, and who knows how difficult that could be! You need to make a move now, as those hands are moving faster than anything you've seen before!
12211.title: Getting Intimate

12213.content:
You can't take it anymore, you have to get up there, by any means necessary! With newfound courage, you begin to run towards one of your Mom's miles long feet, Determined to climb up it until you reach your new promised land.

Meanwhile, Kathy had finished peeing, but had not yet budged from her seat on the toilet, opting to sit there thinking for a bit. Her head turns left and she looks at the shower.
"Hmmm, might as well take a shower while I'm in here..." She says aloud to what she thinks is nobody.

With that, she leans forward and reaches down to slip her panties completely off, when a tiny black dot moving across the tile floor near her feet.

"HUH?" You hear from above you. You freeze as your attention shifts straight up. From up above, looking straight at you, is the face of your colossal mom! There's no way she saw you....did she?

Your mother's face changes from a confused look to a scowl
"A BUG, HUH? ENJOYING YOURSELF, PLAYING AROUND MY FEET? WHY DON'T I JOIN IN?"
You nearly wet yourself at hearing your mother, now the size of a titan, threaten you. You jump and down and wave your arms, screaming.

"No mom! I'm not a bug! I'm your son! IT'S ETHAN!"

Your mom's face changes from her scowl, to a smug smirk.
I GOTTA SAY, YOU'RE THE SMALLEST BUG I'VE SEEN GET IN MY HOUSE. AT LEAST I WON'T HAVE TO WORRY ABOUT CLEANING YOU UP!"

You realise that getting her to recognise you is impossible! Screw it, you don't care what your punishment is, you're going to have to regrow yourself now! You pull out the remote and point it at yourself and click the button, but nothing happens! You look down and the screen still reads 0%! You've got no choice, you turn and start to sprint as far as you can.


Above, Kathy, despite her taunts, knows that the bug doesn't understand what she's saying, but she hates bugs so much, she just can't resist. She sits there, not moving, as she observes the thing for a little bit. 'Good god this thing really is tiny, what a miserable existence it must live.' she thinks to herself. 'Still at least I saw it when I did, I wouldn't want this thing crawling on me' She shudders at the thought.

Eventually she notices that the bug isn't really moving at all. She lifts and taps her big toe next to it, but she still can't see it moving. 'Does this thing have 0 survival instincts?' She wonders. 'Oh well' she thinks as she finally drops the sole of her foot on top of the speck. Feeling better than she did a couple of minutes ago, she reaches over for some toilet paper and wipes herself clean from her pee earlier. Suddenly she stops, and turns her foot over.

Kathy can barely make it out, but she can spot the tiniest red speckle from where her foot met the bug amongst the other bits of dirt and dust on her sole. Not one for waste she uses the same piece of toilet paper she's holding to wipe away the mark, before dropping it into the toilet and flushing it, and the final traces of you, away.

Kathy stands up, stretches again and walks over to turn on the shower. She'll never give that bug a second thought in her life. Your mom will never know that she crushed her darling son under her foot like an insignificant pest.
12213.title: The expected outcome

choices: You show her the remote
You quickly shoot her with the remote!
You panic and shoot yourself!
124.content:
You were still standing there in the middle of the room surveying your options, when suddenly...

BRRRRRRRRRRRIIIIIIIIINNNNNNNNNNNNNGGGGGGGGGGG!!!!!

You jump as the alarm clock on your mom's bedside table suddenly starts ringing! You didn't account for something like this happening before you finished setting up!

"Huh? Wha-!?" Your mum half shouts, half mumbles. She bolts upright, her face still dazed after being suddenly ripped from her sleep. A frown crosses her face as she realises what just happened.
"Ugh, I thought I turned this thing off last night..." She grumbles, finally turning the alarm off and returning her bedroom to the silence it was covered in before.

You, meanwhile, had just been standing in place like a deer in headlights. You really didn't want her to find you creeping in her bedroom first thing in the morning! But you couldn't leave now, she'd definitely see you!

"Ah! Ethan, what are you doing here so early!?" Her voice rings out, finally noticing your presence.

You gulp. Too late.

You turn to look back at her, and sure enough, she's gazing straight at you. Her hair, while still a mess from sleeping all night, didn't hide the confused look she was giving you at the moment.

"Uh..Hey, mom." You answer awkwardly, trying and failing to keep your cool.

"Don't 'Hey mom' me! Why are you standing in my room like that!? Don't tell me you were watching me sleep!" She accuses, her face going from confusion to annoyance. "And what's that thing your holding?" She adds.

You break out into a cold sweat. Busted. She saw the remote too!

What do you do?
124.title: An....Awkward conversation

choices: She found you
She accidentally inhaled you
She didn’t see you
1243.content:
You have no answer that is going to get you out of this situation, so you decide to do the only reasonable thing you can. Shrink yourself!

“I’m waiting for an answer, Ethan!” your mom said coldly, pitting you on the spot.

You try to hide the shrink ray behind your back while you adjust the settings and aim it at yourself. “Well...I...uh,” you stutter. Without any further hesitation, you pull the trigger of the shrink ray, and dwindled down until you are a mere one millimeter tall.

It takes you a second to adjust to your new surroundings, but when your vision is returned your near speck-sized body is surrounded by large, grey strands of shag carpet. “Holy shit, this is amazing,” you whisper to yourself.

Your mom on the other hand was in a state of shock. Was she still asleep and dreaming? Before her very eyes, her son rapidly decreased in size until she could no longer see him. Sitting up at the end of the bed, she began to scan the carpet. “Eth.....Ethan? Are you there?” she asked nervously. Your mom then planted both of her feet onto the sides of where she saw you disappear and began to crouch down.

Dow on the ground, you hear a massive crashing sound. Your jaw drops as you realize it is the giant feet of your mom. She continues to sit until she is on her hands and knees. Her face lowers to near where you are.

“ETHAN? ARE YOU DOWN HERE?”

Your mom’s face is all you can see above he titanic carpet fibers. Her eye looks like some giant aerial predator, scanning for you, her prey. Her pupil seems to focus in on your body, and you begin to run. What happens next?
1243.title: You panic and shoot yourself!

choices: your mother believes this some kind of a dream and 'plays' with you instead.
she heard you and does what you asked.
12431.content:
You run for your life, but carpet is not making it easy. In fact it's more like a dense jungle, so you just dash under a fiber's trunk. It's thicker than any tree you've ever seen, so it's bound to be a good hiding spot.

"IT CAN'T BE..." - your mother's voice booms from above. You hope she'll ignore the whole thing as some hallucination or something. "BUT IT MOVED..." - ouch, what if she thinks you're a bug! You look around for options, but carpet stretches for miles in every direction and you're already tired even after the short 'escape'. Suddenly your roof moves - you look up and see Kathy moving the enormous pillar aside with just a single finger. "OH MY GOD!"

Your mother's voice is so loud that you have to cover your ears in pain. You realize just how absurdly small you are and running away is.. pointless - she's seen you and no matter where you go, you'll be within her arms' reach...

"ETHAN.. IS THAT REALLY.." - at least her voice is quieter now. Or maybe you're just getting used to it... You wave up to her - maybe getting noticed is actually a safer route? "HOW.. WHAT HAPPENED?"

You bring both hands to your mouth and shout as loud as you can. It's no good - she keeps staring down at you. No, you'll have to find another way: you think of the remote, but it still shows 0% - no good then. You wonder how long will it take to recharge...

"I CAN'T HEAR YOU ETHAN" - your mom realizes the obvious, then adds: "OH MY GOD, IT REALLY IS YOU! YOU'LL HAVE TO SPEAK LOUDER!"

If only it was so simple! But at least she can see you - you think of perhaps just acting to explain what happened, but.. you always hated these party games. You were bad at it too... No, but maybe she can pick you up and bring you closer to her ear? You point to your ear with exaggerated moves hoping she'll get the idea.

"OH, RIGHT.. I GUESS YOU'RE TOO SMALL FOR THAT. WHAT ARE YOU DOING? DO YOU WANT ME TO DO SOMETHING?" - okay, at least she's trying to figure it out too. Instead you point to yourself then towards her ear, maybe that'll... "OH I SEE!"

You stop your pantomiming efforts and brace to be picked up, but instead she turns her head and begins to lower it. You panic - it's like the sky falling down... You brace for impact, expecting her head to crush you. Instead it stops just above the carpet fibers and her ear is almost directly over you. That might work too, you realize.

"Mom! Mom can you hear me?" - you shout upwards. Nothing. "Mooom!"

"WAIT, IS THAT... I CAN ALMOST HEAR SOMETHING..."

You repeat, but your voice is just too weak. You consider climbing some fiber, but then she moves the ear even lower. Fibers move around you, displaced by her head - luckily you aren't buried underneath.

"Moooom! Can you hear me?" - you repeat.

"OH MY GOD, I CAN HEAR YOU! JUST.. ONLY JUST..."

"Mom! Put me in you ear!"

"PUT WHAT?"

"Pick me up and put me inside your ear!"

She doesn't respond. You think maybe she didn't hear it, but it seemed to work just now. You want to repeat it, but Kathy raises her head - making any attempts at verbal communication useless. For you anyway, as you can easily hear her:

"IT'S INSANE.. MY SON, SMALLER THAN A BUG, ASKING ME TO..."

You can only await what she does next. It turns out...
12431.title: Not quite small enough to be invisible...

choices: which is clearly not good enough.
and she seems to buy it.
124312.content:
"IT CAN'T BE" - Kathy says and stares at you dumbfounded. She rubs her eyes, apparently having hard time believing what she's seeing. You glance at the remote.. still 0%... c'mon! "WAIT, SO YOU WANT ME.. TO PICK YOU UP.. AND PUT YOU.. IN MY EAR?" - she repeats to herself. You can only look up at her and hope she's careful enough. "I DON'T KNOW, IT'S.. CRAZY! I.. WAVE OR JUMP IF YOU REALLY..." - you do that and she pauses. Your mom continues to stare at you for a moment then looks away. "NO, IT.. I GUESS IT MAKES SENSE? NOW.. HOLD TIGHT..."

She brings her right hand towards you. Fingers the size of modest skyscrapers pinching in preparation of grabbing your minuscule form - it makes you panic again, as you're sure it would crush you. You crouch down and begin to wave and shake your head.

"WHAT ARE YOU.. WHAT DO YOU WANT THEN?" - she demands and retracts her hand. You try to mime putting your hand on the ground palm up and have the other walk onto it. "OH, RIGHT..."

She puts her hand down, producing a major shockwave that throws you back, and.. of course it's not as simple as you imagined it. The wall of her palm is several stories high and climbing it is clearly impossible. But.. you look around and there some fibers nearby reach almost to the top. You run towards them and climb up all the way. She murmurs some "whoa"s and "oh my god"s, but in a few minutes you jump onto the awaiting palm. Which is easily the size of a city block...

Your mother just continues staring down, so you walk - slowly - towards the center of it and consider.. it seems like you got what you wanted, after all. A chance to climb and walk over your gigantic mom? Suddenly she raises the hand and the movement pins you down to the skin. Inertia makes you fly upwards a good dozen feet or so - your scale, of course. Landing is soft enough, but still leaves you dazed a bit.

"NO, THAT WON'T WORK... HERE, CLIMB ONTO MY FINGER" - she suggests and by the time you are able to collect yourself, you can see she already put a finger next to you. You immediately see that you won't be able to do that, but.. instead you walk to its front and climb the fingernail. Underside of her neatly trimmed nail give you more than enough room to sit down. Heck, you could easily park a bunch of cars on it, with room to spare!

You have no way of communicating with her now as the tip of the finger covers most of your view, so you just wait. She peers in to check up on you and moves you to her ear. You prepare to jump inside, but she tilts her head and finger so you fall uncontrollably and slide deep into the ear canal. You are fine, if completely covered in wax.. which sucks, but is definitely better than being crushed in the carpet.

"Mom? Can you hear me now?"

"LOUD AND CLEAR HONEY!" - the voice is overwhelming now, coming from seemingly every direction. Which makes sense considering it must propagate through the flesh around you.

"Moom! Can you speak less loudly, please!"

"WHAT DO YOU..." - she booms again, penetrating through your body - covering ears does nothing. Luckily she then lowers her voice: "I GUESS IT MUST BE LOUD WHEN YOU'RE SO MUCH SMALLER..."

"Yeah! I thought I would go deaf or something..." - you stand up and try to shake off some of the ear wax off yourself.

"OH, THAT TICKLES! SO... WOULD YOU MIND EXPLAINING WHAT HAPPENED, EXACTLY?"

Ouch.

You haven't really thought it through. It seems like there's just no getting around it - you'll have to.. explain yourself. You consider telling the truth, but reject that option almost immediately - wanting to 'climb all over mom while she sleeps' seems way too creepy and perverted. You'll have to bluff your way out of it somehow, so you give it your best shot...
124312.title: Seemed like a good idea at the time...

choices: it should have enough charge to grow you a bit.
the display shows 1%... it's gonna be a while!
1243121.content:
"Well, I.. uh, I wanted to wake you up to ask what you wanted for breakfast, I mean..." - you try to bluff. You realize you never made a breakfast for anybody, but it's too late to change the story now.. "And I just shrunk like this, mysteriously? I honestly have no idea-"

"OH, SO YOU JUST 'HAPPENED' TO SHRINK 'MYSTERIOUSLY' WHEN I CAUGHT YOU SNEAKING AROUND MY BEDROOM?"

Uh, oh.. "Yes, I mean.. it's insane, right? People don't just 'shrink' like that, and-"

"SO THAT SHINY THING YOU IMMEDIATELY HID BEHIND YOUR BACK HAD NOTHING TO DO WITH IT?"

Right... "Oh, that.. that was, just my phone?"

"ETHAN... NO IT WASN'T, PLUS.. I CLEARLY HEARD A CLICK JUST BEFORE YOU VANISHED.. IN THE CARPET."

"Umm.. no, it couldn't.." - you realize you can't really deny that: "It must've been a weird coincidence? Also I didn't hear anything!"

"SO WAS IT A COINCIDENCE OR WAS THERE NO CLICKING SOUND?"

She really got you now. Damn! Your mother always seems to see right through your bluff attempts. But: "I mean, you're making it sound like I snuck into your room with some kind of size remote and..." - you catch yourself telling too much. Way too much. "I mean it's craaazy, isn't it?" - you try to ridicule the idea. All things considered it sound crazy, but then... here you are, in your mother's ear. In any case you can only wait as she processes it. You try to think of something else to add to your 'crazy' story, but Kathy speaks first:

"I DON'T GET IT. I MEAN WHY WOULD YOU.. WAIT A MINUTE, HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN DOING THIS, SNEAKING AROUND AND SHRINKING YOURSELF?"

"No, I never! This was the first.. I mean-"

"SO YOU DID SHRINK YOURSELF, WHOA..." - she catches your indiscretion. To make matters worse, she seems to have been bluffing herself! How could you not have seen it... "BUT THEN, WHY? AND WHAT ON EARTH IS THAT THING? THAT.. SIZE REMOTE?"

"No, it's not.. I mean, I have no idea-"

"YOU AN DROP THE ACT NOW, YOU SHOULD'VE AT LEAST GOTTEN YOUR STORY STRAIGHT..." - your mother is right: that was one bad lie. You consider sticking to your 'story', after all.. what can she do? Actually.. you realize there's a lot your mother can do to extract the truth from you, and even the slightest punishment at your size... you don't even want to think about it. "WELL?" - she demands.

"I... sorry mom, I didn't mean-"

"YEAH, YOU DIDN'T MEAN TO GET CAUGHT, BUT WHY WOULD YOU EVEN DO THAT? I MEAN, YOU COULD'VE SHRUNK ME TO AVOID CHORES OR SOMETHING, BUT INSTEAD..."

"No, I would never do 'that'! I mean, I just.. I..." - you try to come up with some way to make it 'less awkward', at least: "I woke up today and found this.. thing, on the floor. Like I don't even know what it is, it looks like some kind of remote. Except it only has two buttons and... I tested it in my room-"

"WAIT, SO YOU SHRUNK YOURSELF TODAY ALREADY?"

"No no, I mean.. I tested it on my desk. And one button shrinks things while the other grows. Or restores them, I don't know. It's not exactly like I have any idea where or what-"

"YEAH IT IS CRAZY... I HAVE TO KEEP PINCHING MYSELF TO MAKE SURE I'M NOT DREAMING. TO HAVE MY OWN SON INSIDE MY EAR..." - you realize you could've pushed your bluff a bit further, maybe your mom would have bought it. She continues after a brief pause: "YOU'RE NOT JUST SOME CRAZY VOICE IN MY HEAD RIGHT?"

"Mooom!" - you complain, but then decide to mess with her a bit: "Actually, I'm just that. You must be going insane!"

"OH, I GUESS IT'S SAFE TO JUST IGNORE YOU THEN..." - she teases and the idea actually scares you. It would be that simple: ignore, forget.. crush with just a random movement. You try to think of a clever reply, but Kathy giggles: "I'M JUST KIDDING, DON'T WORRY... OH MY GOD.. I REALLY HAVE MY TINY SON..."

"Are you finished?" - you complain, tired of being teased.

"NOT YET.. CAN YOU JUMP, OR SOMETHING? LIKE YOU DID WHEN I PUT YOU INSIDE?"

"Moooom!"

"OH, I'M JUST MAKING SURE I'M NOT GOING INSANE, YOU KNOW. OR AM I JUST TALKING TO MYSELF..." - you still think she's teasing you, but decide maybe it's best for you to play along. Instead of jumping you kick the wall of the tunnel in anger. It worries you a bit that maybe you hurt the sensitive tissue.

She only giggles instead. "WOW, THAT'S JUST.. WOW..." You wait in silence, defeated. "SO YOU JUST SNUCK IN HERE TO.. WHAT? SHRINK AND SEE WHAT HAPPENS?"

"I, uh.." - you can honestly say you haven't really thought it through, but maybe: "I just wanted to see how a normal size person would look like when I'm small, maybe even climb them or-"

"WHAT?!?" - your ears ring for a moment, your mom said it out loud with her normal voice. She sighs and continues: "WHY ME THOUGH? I MEAN, YOU COULD'VE GONE TO SEE ANY OF YOUR SIS... NO, I SUPPOSE IT WOULD'VE BEEN A BAD IDEA. OR RATHER, AN EVEN WORSE ONE..."

"Yeah" - you concur. At least your mom was careful enough not to crush you. What would Jackie or Naomi have done... you shudder at the possibilities. Come to think of it you were lucky that your mom found you as she did - who knows if somebody didn't just step on you had you shrunk yourself before the alarm went off.

"SO, I GUESS YOU SAW BIG OL' ME WHILE 'SMALL'. WAS THAT ENOUGH FOR YOU ETHAN? CAN YOU GROW BACK NOW? I MEAN, MAYBE NOT INSIDE MY EAR, BUT..."

You look at the remote and...
1243121.title: Like a fire on the frying pan.

choices: just wait for whatever she decides for you.
suggest she let you out.
12431212.content:
"Um, actually..."

"YES? AND DON'T TELL ME YOU ENJOYED IT AND WANT TO STAY LIKE THAT!"

"What? I.. No, I'm... Mooom!"

"WHAT?" - she giggles - "WHAT IS IT THEN?"

"Well, it.. the remote I mean, it seems to have some kind of 'charge' and-"

"SO YOU'RE STUCK LIKE THAT?"

"No, I.. don't think so? It's down to 1% now, but seems to recharge on its own."

"SO YOU JUST USED ALL OF IT WHILE TRYING TO DISAPPEAR ON ME?"

"Well-"

"WHAT A NAUGHTY SON YOU ARE..." - she comments. You don't reply as you realize that it is true, to a large degree. "HOW LONG WILL IT BE THEN?"

"I don't know. A couple hours, maybe?"

She sighs. "YOU JUST HAD TO FIND A WAY TO RUIN THE WEEKEND DIDN'T YOU? HOW ARE WE GOING TO GO SHOPPING NOW? NO CHANCE FOR MOVIES AFTERWARDS EITHER..."

Right! You remember now. That's why you had alarm clock set on a Sunday - and presumably same for your mom. Great: "Well, maybe you could still-"

"WHAT? WHERE AM I GONNA FIND CLOTHES TO MATCH YOUR SIZE? OR DO YOU WANT TO BE LOST IN A BAG OF POPCORN?"

"No, I meant like.. go without me?"

"OH NO YOU DON'T! YOU ALWAYS LOOK FOR EXCUSES NOT TO GO HAVE SOME FUN WITH YOUR FAMILY! YOUR BIG SISTER DOESN'T COMPLAIN, EVEN THOUGH I CAN CLEARLY SEE SHE'S OFTEN BORED HERSELF. BUT YOU..." - she rants about it for a while. Normally you argue back or just ignore it, locking yourself in your room. None of that is an option now - your puny voice will drown in her speech and.. you don't even want to think of the drop from her ear. Your mom eventually concludes: "… MORE AND MORE ELABORATE EXCUSES.. THIS TIME YOU'VE REALLY OUTDONE YOURSELF!"

"It wasn't the idea. But I really hate..."

"YES?"

"Nothing..."

She sighs again. "HOLD TIGHT, I NEED TO LIE DOWN TO THINK..." - you want to comment how there's nothing to hold onto inside her ear, but she doesn't wait and stands up. The powerful movements throw you around the ear as your surroundings get completely dark. It is only when they end that you can see your mother plugged the ear so you couldn't fall out... or run away?

"Mom.. um, could you be more careful when moving-"

"SO NOW IT'S ME TO INCONVENIENCE YOU?" - you don't know how to reply to that. You don't want to get hurt, but.. "I GUESS YOU'LL HAVE TO GET USED TO IT! NOW LET ME THINK..."

She settles down on the bed, throwing you around the pitch black cave some more. You then...
12431212.title: Um, actually...

choices: You'll stay in your mother's ear during family time
You'll spend family time at home
Reader's Choice
124312121.content:
After getting tossed around again you decided the best course of action was to just stay down. You didn't like it, but it was better than being bounced off the walls of your mother's ear canal like a pinball.

Your body actually felt kind of sore now. Guess you'd just chalk that up to small body, low durability. That made sense, after at your size just the slightest bit of pressure could make you explode.

You shuddered at that.

Turning over on your back you were greeted by the same darkness. You couldn't even see your own hand in front of your face. "Damn it." you whispered. "I really am just going to have to sit here until she thinks up a plan."

This sucked. You were going to be stuck as a speck for hours and now had to deal with your large and upset mother. You couldn't understand why she made such a big deal about family time anyways. You all saw each other at home all the time, wasn't that enough?

Apparently not as your mother constantly made a big deal about it. Maybe you should've just gone to one of your sister's rooms instead? At least you wouldn't be stuck in a dark ear tunnel.

You sighed. "How do I get myself in these messes?"

The question was left unanswered. All you could do was sit and wait and see what crazy idea your mother came up with. Hopefully it wouldn't be anything too extreme for you. Hopefully.

"ETHAN!?" your mother called.

"Yeah?" You answered.

"I THINK I HAVE AN IDEA!"

"Oh joy."
124312121.title: Change of Plans

choices: Head inwards
Escape
1243121211.content:
“YOU’RE JUST GOING TO HAVE TO STAY THERE WHILE YOUR SISTERS AND I HAVE SOME FAMILY TIME”

Before you can even respond your world once again erupts into chaos sending you flying from your feet and causing you to bounce around the confines of your mothers ear canal. You can’t believe your mothers plan is to keep you in here and pretend everything is normal, whilst spending the day with your sisters.

When the shifting motion eventually stops it is instantly replaced with a heavy intermittent vibration which you can only assume is your mothers feet stomping away miles bellow. She must of lifted her giant self out of bed and is now getting ready to start her day.

“Mom please I don’t want to be in here all day, it’s really hot and it’s making me feel nauseous” you plead desperately to your host.

“OH SHUSH! YOU’RE STARTING TO GIVE ME A HEADACHE, IM SURE I COULD FIND SOMEWHERE WORSE TO PUT YOU IF YOU WANT TO KEEP MAKING A FUSS!”

And with that your mother gave a little flick of her head sending you flying face first into a unfortunately positioned deposit of ear wax covering your entire body in its greasy substance.

“JUST MAKE YOURSELF AT HOME AND TRY NOT TO FALL OUT, ITS ALONG WAY DOWN.

She proceeded to laugh, which shock the tunnel. You’re getting pretty angry now. How could your own mother treat you like this? You had to do something otherwise you’re going to go mad in here. Part of you is tempted to head deeper into her head in an attempt to irritate her enough to let you out. Or maybe now it’s time to try and escape this horrifying prison.
1243121211.title: You'll stay in your mother's ear during...

choices: Kathy jumps into the shower
Kathy decides to place earbuds in her ears
Kathy moves you somewhere else
12431212111.content:
Unfortunately for you, at your size, trying to leave your mother's ear canal without any help may as well be a death sentence. If you made just one mistake... it's just like she said, it'd be a long way down.

You had no desire to become an unnoticeable stain on the floor, so that meant an escape attempt right now was completely out of the question. You'd have to take the direct route and force her to release you.

First things first though, you had to peel yourself free from this disgusting ear grease.

Meanwhile in the outside world, Kathy was headed towards her private bathroom. Just because her only son had shrunk into speck and was now getting comfortable inside her ear, didn't mean she was going to neglect herself.

Still, it was hard to wrap her mind around this whole situation. It was as if a science fiction movie had come to life and the two of them were living it. Ethan had quite literally become the incredible shrinking man.

It really was a good thing he'd chosen to use the device around her and not his siblings. She probably never would have seen him again if that were the case. Thankfully it wasn't, he'd be safe inside her ear while she and her daughters had family time.

"I wonder what I'll tell Jacqueline, Emily, and Naomi when they ask where is?" She wondered aloud as she walked into the bathroom. First she'd brush her teeth and then head into the shower. Then she'd worry about the rest of her kids.

You clearly heard her from the dark tunnel as you freed yourself from the wax. She really was going to go through with this. Fine, you'll be out of here soon enough after you've annoyed your mother into submission.

You took a calming breath and began to head towards wherever you thought the eardrum would be. "Mom!? Hey mom!? Can you hear me!?"

"YEAH! I CAN HEAR YOU!" her voice vibrated around you.

Perfect.

"What's Whitney Houston's favorite type of coordination? HAAANNNDDD EEEEEEEEYYYEEE!!!"

"WHAT?" Your mother said confused.

"What's better than Ted Danson? Ted singing and Danson!" Oh... That was bad.

Both you and your mother cringed. That was just terrible.

"WHAT ARE YOU DOING?" she asked.

"Practicing my stand up." You joked.

"WELL PLEASE STOP." Kathy winced. Your bad jokes reminded her of her grandfather.

You smirked. You're plan was working. "But I can't now. Not when I'm on a role. So what did the drummer call his twin daughter? Anna one, Anna two!"

"PLEASE STOP TALKING." Your mother suggested, although you could tell she was getting annoyed.

Only a matter of time now.

"I bought some shoes from a drug dealer. I don't know what he laced them with, but I was trippin' all day!"

"ETHAN! STOP TALKING." Kath urged, her temper rising. These jokes were just plain awful.

"How do you make holy water? You boil the hell out of it!" Okay... that one was actually pretty good.

"ETHAN..." Kathy seethed.

One more push.

"Hey mom?" You started. Oh revenge was sweet. "How many ears does Spock have? Three. The left ear, the right ear, and the final front-ear!"

"SHUT UP!!!!" Kathy shouted, the vibrations enough to send you falling into another waiting mass of earwax. "ENOUGH WITH THE STUPID JOKES ALREADY! THERE'S SO BAD THEY REMIND ME OF MY GRANDFATHER AND HIS UNCLE JOKES!"

Yep, you remembered great grandpa Micky's jokes all too well. He's the one who told you that last one. "If you let me out you wouldn't have to hear me." you suggested. You prayed she'd take the bait and the hint.

Kathy meanwhile was seething as she understood what you were trying to do. You were trying to force her to let you out by being as annoying as humanly possible.

Well, she was a mother of three and that made her tougher than most. If you wanted to play, then game on.

"What are you doing here?"

You practically jumped hearing a voice coming from behind you. Turning around quickly, you noticed that it was none other than your sister Jacqueline. Her arms were crossed and she was looking at you with an annoyed expression.

You looked back at your mother. She was still asleep, surprisingly enough. She was always a bit of a heavy sleeper even though it was 8 am. She would be getting up soon after all.

"Jacqueline, keep it down. . I'm. . " you spoke very quietly not sure how to explain this.

The two of you move out of your mother's bedroom and into the nearby hallway.

"I was. . . " you struggle to come up with any kind of legitimate reason to be in there.

"Where you trying to take some of mom's cash to buy something? That's a new low. Also. . what is that in your hand?"

You instinctively pull the shrinking device in front of you, showing it to your sister who quickly nabs it out of your hand.

"What is this thing?" she says looking it over.

"Be careful with that, you don't know what you are doing." you say worried. Quickly, you reach over trying to grab it out of her hand.

"Hey!" she says as her fingers slip on the device and press the blue button.

BRRRRRZZZTTTT!!!!!

She blasts you with it and watches as you very rapidly shrink down to only a millimeter in size.

"Oh my god, Ethan! What. . where did you go?"

You watch as your sister grows to absolutely immense portions. Even the simplest features of her body grow into mile wide expanses of skin where you can see every detail. You started screaming, the shock of being shrunken down being too much for you.

BOOM!! BOOM!!!

Your sister got on her knees, hovering thousands and thousands of feet above you, looking down on the floor where you had shrunken down too.

"ETHAN!!" she booms above like a god looking down upon you. You didn't want to get stuck down here so quickly, you started moving around and jumping up and down.

Jacqueline looked down in total confusion not believing what had just happened. Did he really shrink down or did he just get totally vaporized? She kept looking around for him. . but the big question is. . did she end up finding her newly tiny brother?

1251.content:
Jacqueline looked across the fibers closely and noticed that one of them was moving around.

"ETHAN!! IS THAT YOU!!" She said as you stared up at her. She had found you, but you looked in terror as her gigantic hand came down on you.

"Jacqueline! No!! Be careful!!"

Her huge fingers were bigger than skyscrapers and now they were going to very carefully pick you up? She could totally crush you not even intentionally given your new incredibly small size.

You watched as two of her fingers crashed down beside you.

WHAM!! WHAM!!

Then they started to close in on you the ground shaking around as they came for their little prize. You felt the fingers close on you and screamed as they made contact. For you, it was quite rough and constricting, cutting off your air supply and bruising you a little bit.

Your sister had actually been incredibly careful to not accidentally crush you with her fingers as she lifted you up and towards her planet sized face.

Woosh!!

Everything moved so fast, like thousands of miles an hour as Jacqueline stood up and got to her feet. You breathed hard and looked at your sister as she looked at you.

"WOW, THIS. . WERE YOU GOING TO SHRINK MOM WITH THIS?!?" she said showing you the device which now read only 1% charge. It switched to 2% and she noticed.

"SO, THIS SHRINKS THINGS, HUH? I GUESS THE OTHER BUTTON MAKES THEM BIGGER AGAIN!!

She pointed it at you, but totally missed. . instead hitting herself with the beam.

"Aaah!" she yelped but then noticed nothing had happened. What she didn't realize was that she had actually grown about a half an inch but didn't notice.

"HMM. . "she said looking at you then back at the device, then back to you.

"IT SEEMS THIS WON'T WORK ON ME UNLESS IT'S CHARGED BUT IT'S EMPTY NOW!! GOOD THING IT COMES BACK ON IT'S OWN THEN!!" she says thinking about it.

"I WONDER WHAT WOULD HAVE HAPPENED IF IT WAS CHARGED THOUGH. . WELL, WHO KNOWS. . "

At this point, your total shock had passed although you were still terribly frightened given everything that had happened lately. You decided to yell up at your sister.

"Jacqueline!!" you screamed as loud as you could. "That other button does make things bigger again!! You have to return me to normal size!! Take me somewhere safe for now!!"

Jacqueline's expression changed to that of amusement.

"OH WOW!! ETHAN, I HONESTLY COULD NOT HEAR A WORD OF WHAT YOU SAID!! YOU SOUNDED LIKE. . JUST TEENY TINY SQUEAKING!! THAT IS SO CUTE!!"

You felt annoyed that she wasn't doing anything to help you, instead cooing over you like some kind of pet flea or something.

"WELL. . " she said trying to think of what she would do to you next.

Like it or not, you're stuck in your mom's panties, and need to get her attention in order for Jacqueline to use the remote to fix what she's done to you. It's a pain, and not how you'd like to spend your Sunday, but you need to do it, unless you want to spend the rest of your life this size. Or worse, get crushed. You think of how you could best get your mom's attention.

The easiest, and probably safest option would be for you to climb into her ear and scream and shout as loud as you can. At that range she should hear you despite the difference in scale. Another option is to try the more direct route and get in front of her eye, but that comes with more risks, such as the danger of falling, or her seeing a bug instead of her son.

In saying this, both of these options involve a part of the body that's on the opposite side to the one that you were on. You doubted that she'd sleep forever, so at some point during the trip up you'd have to deal with her moving, and you weren't sure that you'd be able to resist it, judging from how beat up you are from a short walk in Jacqueline's hand. Darn! If only she dropped you somewhere more reasonable! You kick the ground in frustration.

Immediately, everything shakes and you're thrown off your feet. And as soon as the quake started, it finished. What was that? Did your mom feel that kick just then, and wiggled slightly because of the irritation? That's it! You can cause a disturbance and get her to investigate that way! You start stomping the ground as hard as you can, jumping up and down as well. But nothing else happens.

This isn't working, you're too small and mom's skin is too thick to feel you. If only there was somewhere nearby that was....more....sensitive....

You gulp, turning around and looking into the distance. You can think of a nearby sensitive area. A very sensitive area. The repercussions for doing this will be staggering, especially if it works and mom discovers you. You don't think anyone would be able to talk their way out of being found tiny inside their mothers panties. But as long as it works, you resolve to give it a try. You mentally prepare yourself and begin walking south.

After a few minutes of walking, or at least what feels like a few to you, you reach a steep slope. You're hands a shaking, you know what's down there. The thicker forest of pubic hairs surrounding you, curling into the sky, mixed with the overwhelming smell of sweat mixed with mom's musk and pheromones is only serving to give you a very regretful and very hard erection. "I'm doing this because I need to." You kept repeating to yourself over and over.

You look down as far as you can without slipping, and can barely make out the shape of your mom's clitoral hood. There it is. You take a minute to collect yourself before climbing down there.

Eventually, after a very slow climb down, you reach your destination. You stop briefly to take a small rest, your arms killing you. The smell is magnified many times compared to what it was like up top, and your sense of smell heightens as your other senses pick up to compensate for the lack of light, only making it more powerful. Perhaps this wasn't the best idea.

Regardless, you climb down a tad more, until finally, you're standing on top of your own mothers clitoris. What happens?

Flushing the toilet, Kathy walked towards her sink and started to wash her hands. She looked at herself in the mirror. She really needed to brush her hair but she would take care of that later. Wiping her hands on the towel, your mother let out a loud yawn.

As she yawned, she started to suck inward. You screamed as you were pushed closer and closer to your doom down your mother's gullet. Trying with all of your might, you grasped onto the little ridges in her tongue in the vain hope that would save you. .but you could barely hold on.

Either way, she grew increasingly more frantic as she searched between the carpet fibres for her younger brother. He has to be there somewhere! Jacqueline jumped in surprise as her youngest sister Naomi snuck up on her. How long had she been there? Did she see what happened? Either way, having a second person in the area would be bad for Ethan if he was still around somewhere! She'd have to distract her somehow!

What does Jacqueline do?

It's size is beyond what you had originally thought it was, Mom didn't have very large feet at normal size, but these could probably wipe out half of a city at this scale!

As the foot nears you, uncaring for your pleas for survival, it wrinkles slightly in preparation for landing. Each wrinkle was as deep as a canyon! Perhaps if you get lucky you might be able to fit in between one of her wrinkles and dodge being completely stepped on? It's a slim chance but it's all you have, as the foot rapidly approaches! You can both feel and hear the wind being pushed down as the the gigantic foot comes in for it's landing. As the faint smell of sweat permeates the area, all you could do is curl up and hope that, if there is a higher power, it would spare you.

Unfortunately for you, in this case the higher power was your mother's foot. And it decided that your fate was to be crushed beneath it. You never felt your body be obliterated underneath the lazy footstep of your uncaring mother, who was only focusing on breakfast and keeping her daughter happy. She would never know that her son met his end as an insignificant speed bump on her path to food.

Kathy moved onward down the hallway with Naomi, and after waiting a few minutes for Jacqueline decided it would be easier to just cook breakfast herself. By the time she had finished eating what was left of your remains were already wiped off across the floor without a trace. Jacqueline searched for a little while longer, but after no success simply hoped that you were killed by the remote, rather than her being unable to find you, or worse. She never told a soul about your fate.

"Jacqueline, I'm here! You shrunk me!" You scream as loud as you can, jumping and waving frantically, desperate for her to notice you. But your worst fears were realised when...

"I THINK...I MAY HAVE KILLED HIM..." Jacqueline's voice quivers with worry. She didn't expect this thing to vaporise her own brother! With a dejected look on her face, she stops coming the carpet, and stands back up to her full imposing height.

She gasps

"WELL, I GUESS HE WON'T BE ABLE TO TRY THIS EVER AGAIN. She looks to the remote "AND YOU, I NEED TO DISPOSE OF BEFORE THIS HAPPENS AGAIN!" And with that, Jacqueline turns and begins to walk back to what you assume is her bedroom, each step causing a titanic *BOOM!* that didn't fade even as the distance widened.

What do you do?

"Damn it!" You cursed. You'd been walking for what felt like an eternity, the carpet's fibers acting as a sort of pseudo-jungle. A part of you wondered if this is what it was like for explorers and archaeologists when they went trekking through the wild. Probably? But you did really care about any of that. This line of thinking was only meant to distract you from your fear.

Fear that you would fail in your attempt to reach Jacqueline's room and retrieve the remote. Without it you were doomed to live the rest of your life as a speck. Truthfully you'd rather be dead than go through life like that. That wouldn't be a life, how can living in constant fear at the mercy of others constitute as a life? Simple answer: It didn't.

Another thing bugging you was Jacqueline herself. You wouldn't admit it, but hearing her accuse you of attempted murder against your own mother for money of all things, really stung. She actually thought you were willing and capable of taking another person's life. Granted you could see how she thought that after she shrunk you. She thought you were dead and jumped to conclusions without the facts.

Why didn't you hold onto the remote tighter? Why did you even show it to her at all? Maybe if you told her everything before showing her the device than maybe you wouldn't be here right now? Hindsight is 20/20 and right now you were batting zero. That was just your luck too wasn't it?

"Yeah. That's just my luck." You said aloud as no one would hear you. Thankfully you mother or other siblings hadn't come out of their rooms yet. The last thing you needed was people unaware of your miniscule existence running about. That would just make things a whole lot harder. Damn! You just wished there was a way to speed this journey up. Time was of the essence here!

Fortunately or rather Unfortunately for you, fate had other plans.
