125322.content:
*BUZZZ*

*BUZZZ*

*BUZZZ*

"There goes that buzzing again." You said to yourself. That's the third time you've heard it and it appears to get louder the deeper you travel into this fake forest. What was it? Was it some kind of bug? The thought made you shudder. Bugs were probably bigger than you now or on par if you were lucky.

You prayed to god that it wasn't something dangerous like a spider or roach... or termite. Although spiders, roaches, and termites don't buzz. Well, most roaches anyway. Perhaps it was downed fly or some kind of bee. It wouldn't be the first time yellowjackets invaded your house. You could still remember watching your little sisters scream in terror not wanting to get stung.

Granted you didn't want to get stung either, but as the man of the house it was up to you to deal with the pest problems. So you were no stranger to insects. But things were different now, you'd lost your size advantage and now it was an even playing field. It one of those creepy crawlies got their mandibles around you it was all over.

*BUZZZ*

*BUZZZ*

*BUZZZ*

There goes the sound again and it's even louder than before. In fact, it should be only be a few more steps ahead just beyond more fibers. You took a second to calm your nerves. A part of you wanted to just ignore it, just walk around the sound, but that might take too long and you were current in a race against the clock.

Was it worth it to just ignore and waste more time?

No!

"Screw it! I'm coming through!" You declared. You peeled back the carpet fibers and your eyes widened. A black body, multiple limbs, wings, and above all else, slightly bigger than you... a gnat. A gnat was bigger than you. A gnat was tangled up in your carpet.

A part of you felt bad for the insect. Trapped like a fly in a spider's web. Maybe you should untangle the little guy? Gnats were harmless from what you understood, just annoying. That's when an idea hit you. Gnats were annoying and fast. If you could free it, then maybe you could hitch a ride and get noticed.

But then again because gnats were annoying and well... bugs. There was a high probability that someone in the house might just try to kill it and by extension... you. Was it worth the risk?

*BUZZZ*

*BUZZZ*

*BUZZZ"

"Hmmm?"

HUH? WHAT WAS THAT FLASH?

It looks so weird because it's so far above you! And these columns are actually the carpet fibres of Jacquelines bedroom floor! You've somehow shrunk yourself instead! You need to fix this ASAP, you look to the remote, only to see the LED is now red and reads 0%. Idiot! You've used up all the juice and are stuck as a microscopic being in your sisters bedroom!

You immediately get a text back from Bianca thanking you, with a few hearts at the end. At least she's still excited.

Now that Ashley is coming over, you have to rethink your plan. With a second person to distract each other, it would most likely make it easier to sneak up on one of them, but it would also double the chances of you getting spotted. As for telling them about it, you have no idea how either'd react to the information, but something tells you that letting Ashley know might cause her to plant some...interesting ideas in Bianca's mind.

Still not fully understanding, you comply. It was easy to access the device as you knew the password and you smiled pleasantly at the background image of Bianca and yourself at the park. "What am I looking for again?"

That was right, Ashley still wanted you to massage her foot. The bitter rage you felt suddenly manifested into a smirk, "Sure thing." You gripped the foot that held Bianca captive and pressed a thumb into. "Don't worry. I'll be gentle."

"Bianca!" you tried again. Static-y noises came from your cell to hers.

"Hmm, I think you are right. Good thinking, Bianca." Ashley said now looking more closely on her own body and hands.

"Wait, look. . the echo wasn't very strong that time. He must not be on you. . but. . he must be on me." She said realizing your predicament as she moved the cell phone away from her face.

She still jostled around a bit, her big heaving breasts again sucking you down. You were now having trouble breathing and the only noise you were making in your phone was your coughing voice as the weight only got more intense.

"Hurry, Bianca, it sounds like he's coughing." Ashley said listening to your feint coughs coming from Bianca's phone.

The two girls looked frantically over for you, Ashley looking around Bianca and her back, Bianca looking through the front.

"I can't believe he is so small that I can't even feel him on me. I have no idea where he is." your worried girlfriend said in disbelief.

If she didn't find you soon, you'd be pulverized for sure. An idea popped in your head though, maybe you could intentionally go deeper into the cleavage and try to fall on her lower body. That would at least buy you some time so you don't get crushed in her cleavage.
143311122.title: Should have gone with Verizon

choices: Fallen down to her pants, by the waist!
Fallen all the way down to her shoe!
Landed on Ashley's head!
1433112.content:
KNOCK! KNOCK! KNOCK!

You were staring up at the two gigantic girls when suddenly there was a knock at the door! It seemed to not only surprise you, but also surprise Ashley as well, as she jumped at the sound too. Unfortunately this jump, while small to her, has launched you off of her finger and into the air! You shoot up at what feels like a rapid speed and everything rushes around you! You can barely see what's happening, and it's taking everything you have to not be sick!

"AAAHHH, ETHAN!" Ashley's voice booms out. You must have been closer than before as the noise was even louder than before! You cover your ears as you get pushed from the shockwave of her voice further into the air!

It felt like ages, but it was actually only a second or two later when you made impact with solid ground. Your thankful for the security of the ground as you brush yourself off from the landing. You'll definitely be feeling this later. But that wasn't the biggest concern you had at the moment, where were you?

"WHERE IS HE, ASHLEY?" A super pissed Bianca's voice thunders from off in the distance. She's definitely angry, which usually doesn't end well from your experience. Bianca's voice sounds further away then when it was on Ashley's finger, so you've definitely moved a decent distance away from Ashley's finger. Hopefully they'll be able to find you!

Suddenly, everything shakes violently as it knocks you over! This confirms to you that you're definitely still on one of the girls after all!

"I'M SORRY! IT SURPRISED ME! I DIDN'T THINK THIS WOULD HAPPEN!" Ashley loud whispers back at Bianca. Her voice was definitely louder, so you can conclude that you've fallen somewhere on Ashley's body! You look around to try and get a better perspective on your new area.

You have...
1433112.title: A Tiny Passenger

choices: Ashley remembers what you told her earlier!
The Girls have no idea what just happened!
One of the Girls test the remote!
143312.content:
As you hit the button, you accidentally lean back in the chair a little too far! Off balance, you wave one hand in the air to balance yourself, and move the other to the ground to secure yourself. But in doing so, the remote slips out of your hand at the last second! You try to quickly grab it again but it's already too late! Your hand grabs nothing as a flash blinds your eyes!

Your vision returns a few seconds later, and you're met with a strange new world. You're incredibly small! What was before your desk is now what appears to be an endless flat landscape! A few hundred metres off in the distance you can see what looks like the end of the earth, but it's actually just the edge of the desk! You look around at other landmarks on the desk too, you had a book sitting nearby, and now it's higher than any building you've ever seen before! Your computer monitor towers even higher above that!

But that's not the landmark that has your attention the most. Right behind you is the still unshrunken remote! There's no way that you'll be able to operate it now at this insignificant size, you're only way to get back to normal is for someone else to do it for you!

"HUH? E-ETHAN? WHERE'D YOU GO?" An incredibly loud booming voice rings out across the world. You recognise the voice, though distorted to be Bianca's confused voice. You turn to look at where she was, and your jaw nearly hits the floor. She's huge!

Bianca's fairly short, so you're staring at her stomach from your spot on the desk, but the rest of her body absolutely dwarfs you in every way! You can barely believe how high she reaches above you! You look up towards her face (And get distracted slightly by her now mountainous breasts and cavernous cleavage) to see her looking down towards you, with a concerned and confused look on her face as she brushes some of her miles long black hair out of her face. Did she see you?

"WHAT HAPPENED?" A faraway voice that could only have been Ashley thunders. She's so far away that you can't even see her!

"I-I DON'T KNOW! HE WAS THERE BEING STUPID AND NOW HE'S GONE! AND THIS THING IS THERE INSTEAD!" Bianca's panicked voice roars, making you cover your ears. She doesn't see you! This is a major problem considering you need one of the girls to fix you at the moment!

"Bianca! I'm down here!" You scream up at her, jumping and waving your arms as well.

Bianca's face doesn't even flinch. Either she doesn't notice your movements or they're too small for her to see! One of her arms begin to move towards you as her hand suddenly enters your line of sight and blocks the sky! You recoil in fear at the sight of it, forgetting for a moment that it belongs to your gentle girlfriend, as you watch her hand shoot across the sky at frightening speeds. It reaches and rests itself on the remote, before gripping it and pulling it far out of any range where you could ever reach it!

"WHAT'S THIS THING?" Bianca questions to herself and Ashley. "IT WASN'T THERE BEFORE, THIS IS SO WEIRD!" She says, panic and worry starting to set in.

"Bianca be careful! You need that to fix me!" You shout at her, despite knowing better.

"LET ME HAVE A LOOK." Ashley's voice rings out, as you can hear booming movements in the distance, she must be coming over to check it out.


Where does their investigation end up?
143312.title: Slippery Hands

choices: There's a second knock on the door
Cynthia wants you to prove it!
Mom wants to inspect it first.
14333.content:
You decide that there really isn't any surprise if you were to tell one of the girls about you being able to shrink yourself. There's pretty much a 0% chance that Ashley would believe you until it happened, and Bianca is too much of a blabbermouth to ever properly keep a secret, she'd absolutely spill the beans immediately! But it's definitely dangerous to do this without telling someone, so it looks like you'll have to tell mom, which is probably the smartest choice anyway, if you plan on using the remote again in the future.

You pick up the remote and put it in your pocket, before leaving your room and heading down to the living room where mom most likely is. Sure enough there she is, watching the television.Her hair fixed slightly better compared to when you last saw her a few minutes ago, but still fairly messy.

"Hey mom, can I tell you something real quick, before the girls get here?" You speak up, surprising her slightly, she was too focused on the TV again.

"Sure, what is it, sweetie?" She asks, taking a chip from the table and eating it in one bite.

You prepare yourself for one weird conversation. "Well...it's about this remote here that I found in my room..."

*Knock**Knock**Knock*

Before you could finish, you're interrupted by a series of knocks on the door. Both of you turn to face the door. Forgetting about the conversation, you're mom let's out a quick "Oh!" before getting up and dashing over to the door. It's still pretty early for Bianca and Ashley to get here, so this must be...

"Ahhhh!" Your thoughts are confirmed immediately by the sounds of small squeals and the sight of your mother and Cynthia hugging each other in your doorway. You're used to this so you just stand there and wait for them to finish, tuning out the sounds of rapid fire talking and giggling. Eventually, they calm down slightly and they both come into the house properly.

"Oh, I see you weren't the only one waiting eagerly for me to arrive!" Cynthia jokes before coming over to hug you in greeting as well.

"No no, he's just waiting for his girlfriend to get here." Mom corrects, going back to the couch.

Cynthia gasps. "This early in the morning? Somebody needs to tell you two to control yourself!" She says with a laugh.

"Alright, new topic please." You try to steer the conversation, not really comfortable talking about that around your mom or your neighbour.

"Oh, that's right! You had something you wanted to tell me before, didn't you Ethan?" Mom says, finally remembering the reason you're here in the first place.

Cynthia gives you a look. "Oh really? Are you keeping secrets from everybody again? You remember what happened last time!" She says the last part with a laugh, your mom laughing too.

You shudder, no way you're reliving that memory.
"I just wanted to tell you about this remote." You say, as you pull the remote out of your pocket, to what could only be described as a reaction of apathy and confusion.

"What, that's it? Boorrriinnggg!" Cynthia mocks you, before flopping onto the couch next to mom.

"It's not just a remote!" You continue, annoyed. "It's a remote that shrinks things...somehow. I was planning on using it when the girls arrived, and I thought you should know before they do in case something happened." You add.

The confusion on their faces only increases, as both women give you a look.

"Hey Kathy, I think your son started drinking earlier than we did!" Cynthia teases.

"It does sound pretty unbelievable, honey." Your mom lightly puts you down.

"You might not believe it, but I'm serious! I tried it out before on my desk!" You attempt to convince them.
14333.title: Keeping a Secret

choices: You have no choice, you shrink yourself
You ask one of the women to volunteer
You point the remote at one of the girls and fire!
143331.content:
Your discussion is interrupted prematurely by the sound of knocks on the front door for the second time in the last few minutes. This is most likely Bianca and Ashley, but you still haven't really convinced mom that you're about to shrink yourself, so you feel like you should make sure that you're on the same page before you try anything. You turn to look at your mom first, with a bit of a pleading look in your eyes.

"What are you waiting for? You shouldn't keep them waiting." She says, completely shutting down any signal you were giving her, or maybe she was just ignoring it? Sighing, you put the remote back in your pocket and put on a happy face as you went to answer the door.

"Hey babe!" Bianca shouts as she effectively jumps on you as a greeting. You slightly get knocked back in surprise, but she's fairly light so you hold her no problem, returning the hug back. Ashley only rolls her eyes as she squeezes past the two of you in the doorway, and greets your mom and Cynthia when she sees them. Realising they were there, Bianca hops off you to say hello too.

"So, do you girls have anything planned today?" Mom asks them.

"Nope!" Bianca replies with a smile. "But I'm sure we'll do something fun!"

Then, Cynthia pipes up.
"Why doesn't Ethan use that magical remote of his?" She says, smirking at you while she says it.

You facepalm and groan. So much for surprises. Did she have to spill the beans? And Immediately too?

Bianca and Ashley both turn to you, with a familiar look of confusion. That seems to be common this morning.

"A magic remote? What's she talking about Ethan?" Bianca asks you.

"Yeah, it's uh..this thing." You say, pulling the remote back out of your pocket. It's definitely uncomfortable talking about your magic remote in front of 4 women that don't believe you when you talk about it.

"Anndd...what does it do?" Ashley says, leaning in for a closer look.

You pull the remote back slightly. "Hey, be careful, it shrinks things really small."

"Huh?" Both of the girls say in unison. Cynthia only laughs in the background.

"I knew they wouldn't believe it!" She shouts, elbowing your mother.

"I told you, I'm serious! It really works!" You shout defensively.

"Ethan...you haven't been mixing up dreams with reality again have you?" Bianca asks, with concern.

"Enough!" You declare. "I guess I'll just have to prove it myself!"

"Oh this'll be good" Cynthia adds, getting a giggle from Mom and Ashley.


How do you prove it?
143331.title: So much for secrecy

choices: The remote's at 100%. Nice!
The remote's gone!
Nope, charge is still pretty low...
A family member is already in your room!
15.content:
"No." you think to yourself. "I should probably wait for it to recharge back to 100%". Showing an impressive amount of self control, you decide to take the safer option and hold off on using the remote until you're able to work with the whole battery. After all, what happens if something was to go wrong and you were stuck small with the remote at 0%? Though you're sure you'd never be stupid enough to put yourself into a dangerous situation like that.

With that, you open one of your drawers and place the remote in there for safekeeping. Probably being a bit too secretive, but there's nothing wrong with being too careful. Making a mental note of it's charge, 37%, and the time, 8:17. You leave your room and head downstairs to the the kitchen to make breakfast.
____________________________________________________________

You enter the kitchen to see that apparently everybody else is already awake, a rare occurrence for your family.

"Hi sweetie, you're up early." Your mom greets you. "Give me a moment, a made enough for you as well"

"Thanks mom." You respond, doing your best to act casual.

"Are you alright? You're all sweaty." She asks, with a hint of concern. "You're not getting sick are you?"

"No no, I'm fine, just..... doing some morning exercises" You improvise. It's been 3 minutes and you're already caused suspicion!

"Really? Alright...." It seems like she'll take your word for it, but she doesn't seem convinced.

"It's not like it's out of the ordinary for him to act weird anyway" Jacqueline chimes in from the table.

"Good morning to you too" You respond with an equal amount of snark

"Alright you two, I don't need you bickering all day. Cynthia's coming over later today and we don't need her to hear that while she's here. You should follow what your sisters are doing" As she motions towards your younger siblings, who are focusing on eating rather than talking. Naomi looks up and gives a proud smirk.

Your mom then gives you a plate, and you join the rest at the table.
______________________________________________

Due to you getting there last, you're the last one to finish eating. Your sisters all went to their rooms, while your mom said she was going to try and get some cleaning down now while she has time. You finish eating and check your phone. 9:08. It's been nearly an hour, you may as well go and check how the remote is doing.
15.title: An Agonising wait

choices: Head down to Mom and Cynthia
Sneak into Jacqueline's room
Text Bianca about meeting up
151.content:
You open your drawer to check on the remote, and it's at 100%! Awesome, that didn't take long at all! You pick it up and place the remote in your pocket, you're ready to get up to some mischief. Only now you have a different problem, who's the target?

You don't have the advantage of being able to sneak into bedrooms in the early morning anymore, so now you have to either trick someone or shrink early and hike the remaining distance undetected. Considering the conversation during breakfast option 2 is probably the easier option, though you have to be mindful of the battery as well.

You look out your window and get a view of the backyard, there you can see your mother and your neighbour Cynthia relaxing outside in lounge chairs on the patio. It looks like they're sunbathing and chatting...with wine? You sigh. Isn't it a little early for that? Regardless, they might be a bit preoccupied to notice you approaching.

Alternatively, you're sure that Jacqueline is locked up in her room. You've always wanted to see what she gets up to in there, perhaps now's your chance.

And if all else fails, you can always call Bianca, she'd definitely be up for something.
151.title: Raring to Go

choices: Shrink right now
Go out there and wait for your chance
1511.content:
You decide to go downstairs and visit the ladies outside. Sure, there's more chances of there being something that goes wrong since there are two potential people that can catch you in the act, not to mention that your mom will definitely do something to punish you if you get caught. But you've had a crush on Cynthia since you were 6, so you're willing to risk it for a chance to get closer to her.

As you reach the back door, the two women are in sight, backs facing you. They're both occupied talking about something, you're not really paying attention to that, you're thinking of how you're going to approach this. You can either shrink now and walk over there, or you can think of something to ask them, walk out there and then shrink once they lose focus on you for an instance. That one involves less of a walk, but i's all over if they notice.

So, decision time. What's the plan?
1511.title: Double trouble

choices: No, she's just talking to your Mom and Cynthia through the door
She saw something, and is coming to investigate!
15111.content:
You decide that you'd rather risk the walk over there across the patio over the chance of mom or Cynthia catching you at a tiny size. You're sure they wouldn't do anything too bad to you, but you can't imagine that experience being anything less than awkward. Besides, there shouldn't be any issues during the trek over anyhow.

And so, making sure that you'll be able to get past the screen door once you're small, you prepare to shrink yourself. There aren't any settings on the remote, so you just assume that the scale is tied to how long you hold the button. The plan is to tap the button repeatedly until you're a nice and subtle inch or two tall. and with that, you point the remote at yourself and tap the blue button.

BZZZZZTTTTTTT!!!!!!

Your vision is clouded with white as you're blinded during the process, you feel a dropping sensation as well. A long dropping sensation. How far down are you going, you only tapped the button once? Eventually both phenomena fade and you check your surroundings, and are immediately floored.

The gap under the door, which you were planning to crawl under, is the size of a skyscraper! And the door above it reaches up into infinity, it's so high that you can't actually see the top of it! The tile floor you were standing on has magnified to the size of several city blocks put together, while the gap between each tile may as well be a deep crevice with how deep it is, how small are you? You can't be any bigger than a millimetre, if that! You silently thank yourself for only tapping the button if it caused this. Glancing at the remote you can see that the battery has drained all the way to 11%, which is nowhere near enough to get you back to normal.

BOOM!BOOM!BOOM!

You're suddenly distracted from your size comparisons by what feels like a world ending series of earthquakes. The sound, which is strong enough to hurt your ears, appears to be coming from behind you, you turn around....

And are greeted with the approaching form of your little sister turned giga goddess Emily! And she's walking this way! As she approaches,each step throws you around even more than the last, and you get more and more overwhelmed by her sheer dominating presence, being able to completely control your fate with just her footsteps. As everything intensifies, you begin to see more and more details, such as the unnoticeable cracks and callouses on her feet, the build-up of dust and dirt on her sole, the overpowering scent of lotion applied who knows how long ago. Eventually, the earthquakes, and thus the footsteps as well.

You look in front and are greeted with a sheer wall of white as far as you can see in every direction. You know from your situation that you are looking at a part of her foot up close, but it's size terrifies you, especially with it being a few miles away from you, or, in non-speck measurements, you're 1 centimetre from her pinky toe. You feel like cowering and hiding, and this is just your little sister! You can't fathom what kind of Gargantuan Goddess that Mom and Cynthia have become!

You try to look up at Emily's face, but it's too far in the distance for you to make out any details, you have no idea what the intentions of this divine being are. And then a terrifying thought hits you. You didn't check behind you when you shrunk, what if she saw something? At this size with no way to grow back yet, if she finds you you are completely at her mercy!
15111.title: Immediate Risks

choices: She has seen you. Your fate is no longer yours to control
She hasn't  actually seen you
151112.content:
Emily walked downstairs, looking to get something to eat. She didn't eat breakfast that long ago but she didn't want to wait until lunch, and she's hungry now. As she reaches the first floor she rounds the corner, and just as she does so she sees what looks like a glowing blob rapidly sink into the floor by the back door.

"What the..." She mumbled to herself. Curious, she walks over to the back door, to the spot that she thinks the blob disappeared at, or at least where she thinks it happened.
__________________________________________________

This is real bad, you're pretty much in a no-win scenario here. There are 3 possible options here, and all 3 suck. You can either be seen by Emily, and who knows what happens next from that. You can avoid detection, but get crushed underfoot accidentally anyway, or you can avoid detection completely, but then you're still stuck at a microscopic size for the foreseeable future anyway. But if it's any, you're praying to a higher power that's it the third option.

Your thoughts are again interrupted by the movements of the living titan in front of you. Impossible to be heard normally, you cover your ears as the sounds of Emily's bones and muscle movements threaten to deafen you from their close range. Emily readjusts herself to be squatting now above you. Her face is now barely in visible range, as it appears faded and distorted from how far away it is. Despite this, you can feel her eyes scanning the area, and over you as well. Fortunately you're so small that she still can't see you despite moving in for a closer look, trying to find any advantage that you can take from this situation.

Suddenly, the Goddess Speaks
"I know I saw something...." To Emily this was a mumble, but to you she may as well have beat you over the head with a bat from the force of the sound waves hitting your body. Unfortunately for you, which seems to be a common occurrence over the last few minutes, Emily again decides she needs to look closer. She readjusts again, laying her arms down on the ground for support (While causing more earthquakes and chaos for you) she moves her head right over the tile that you currently inhabit.

Emily's face is much clearer now, as it has become the sky over your puny world. Her breaths provide both a constant booming noise and a fierce wind for you as well. And to top it off her arms now trap you, leaving you with only a single direction that does not contain Emily's expansive body. Not that escape was ever an option.

Fear begins to grip you anew. There is a very real chance that Emily will spot you from this close and at this angle. regardless of size you do stand out against white tile, and if she detects you as a living being it's curtains for you. Every instinct in your body tells you to run, but you know that might give you away. However, at that moment your eyes meet with the Goddesses, and you can see every detail of her eye stopping and focusing. This is it, she saw you! You need to go now! You turn and run for one of the cracks between tiles, hoping you can lose her there.
151112.title: The Gaze of a God

choices: "I KNEW I SAW SOME WEIRD BUG"
"HOW'D YOU GET LIKE THAT, ETHAN?"
1511121.content:
"Huh? What's that?" Emily's voice thunders from above you. That sounds very bad. There's nothing else on this tile that could possibly be out of the ordinary except for you! But you're still so far away from the crack, and safety. You put forth any extra effort you have left into sprinting the rest of the distance before Emily can make a move.

"Hehe, where do you think you're going little guy?" The giggling voice of Emily booms, followed by an incredible rustling and whooshing noise. She's moving! Whatever's happening, you have no time to turn back, if you slow down then you have an even smaller chance than you currently have! There's not that far to go, you just have to hope she's content with watching for just a little longer....

*BOOOOMMM!!!!*

Suddenly, a pillar drops from the skies above you and impacts the ground right in front of you! The force of it's impact is enough to send you tumbling onto the ground, and the winds drawn up from it's speed pushes you back at the same time! You're too late! You recover and scramble to your feet, and look up at the daunting form of what was simply Emily's index finger. It's form throws a shadow over your entire world, and it's size is indescribable, it genuinely feels like it's taller than any building on the planet!

"Gotcha!"

You turn to look up at your newfound captor, and see The great sky that is Emily's face smirking down at you, obviously aware of the absolute power that she holds over you. She playfully traces her finger in circles around you, making a horrific scraping *SCRREEEEECCCCHHHH* noise that is impossible for one at her size to hear. You cover your ears to block some of the noise, but it doesn't really do much. You look back up at Emily.

She says...
1511121.title: The Touch of  a God

15111211.content:
Huh? She sees you, but she doesn't see you? She just sees an ordinary bug instead? You're not sure if that's a blessing or a curse.

"I thought saw something, but it turns out it was just some stupid little bug." Emily grumbles, a scowl turning on her face.

You don't think you like where this is going. You take a few steps back, preparing for another run at a moments notice.

Emily's face turns into a smile. One that looks rather fake up close if you say so yourself.
"So! To make up for wasting my time, I think you deserve to be crushed little guy!" Emily declares.

Shit! You knew it! You have no time to waste, you start sprinting with all you've got.

"Now I don't want to get my hands dirty with bug guts, so I guess I'll just step on you." Emily continued, either unfazed or unaware of your escape act. Dammit, if only you were bigger, you could get out of this whole situation, or even just get her attention at the least!

Wait. Bigger? The remote!

While running, you pull out the remote and look at it. 60%! Perfect! You'll give Emily a shock when you suddenly burst up from underneath her, but it's a lot better than being crushed underneath her instead! Still running, you turn the remote towards you...

*BOOOOOOMMMMM!!!!!!* *BOOOOOOOOOOMMMMM!!!!!*

Everything shakes violently with earth shattering force. It's enough to throw you off of your feet, and unfortunately, the remote out of your hands. The force is enough to push the remote a good 50 metres off into the distance! Dammit! You were so close!

You turn to look at the source of the quakes to see Emily has returned to her overpoweringly immense standing form. She's looking down, right at you! But she hasn't moved yet, maybe she can't see you? You take the chance to make a final sprint for the remote.

"Ah, there you are." Is all you hear before a shadow looms over everything. You look up and see the huge, slightly wrinkled but definitely dirty sole of your younger sister. This isn't fair, you just wanted to look at your Mom and Neighbour while tiny! You didn't deserve to get stepped on by sister! But you're out of time!
"Wait Emily stop! It's me! Don't step on-"
Is all that you managed to get out before impact.
___________________________

After a quick scan, Emily sighted the tiny bug, before lightly tapping her foot over the general area where it was and where it was running. It wasn't very big, so that's probably all it needed. She stood tall, her foot resting on the bugs final resting spot.

"There we go. But I wonder how I even spotted something that tiny in the first place from so far away? Weird." She mused.
"Ah, whatever." Emily quickly put those thoughts, and the bug, out of her mind. She opened the door.
"Mom! Can I go out tonight?"
15111211.title: A God's Judgement

choices: You tell the truth
You lie
15111212.content:
You don't really understand how Emily recognizes you when she shouldn't even be able to spot you but you don't care because this is way better than being mistaken for a bug. Emily moves her hand in front of you on the floor indicating that you should hop on. However, you're too small to climb up her finger so you have to stand on her fingernail. At least they're long enough so you have a lot of space. When she sees you on her fingernail she lifts her hand up to her ear and drops you off.

Do you tell her the truth about the shrink ray or do you lie to her?
15111212.title: "HOW'D YOU GET LIKE THAT, ETHAN?"

choices: Success!
Cynthia saw something happen!
15112.content:
You don't really want to waste time walking over there while small, what if they decide to get up and move or something? You doubt you'd be able to keep up at a small size. You don't really know what you're going to say, but you decide to open the door and wait for your chance outside.

As you close the screen door behind you, your Mom notices and turns her head to look at you. She was sitting up at the time so it was easier for her, Cynthia meanwhile didn't look to react at all.
"Oh, Sweetie, what are the odds? We were just talking about you." Wait what? They were talking about you?

"Really? Why?" You question, curiosity overtaking you.

"Oh, nothing major, we were just talking about when you and your sisters were younger" Your mom answers.

"And how cute you used to be." Cytnhia adds, finally saying something.

"What do you mean, 'used to be?'" You retort, slightly annoyed.

"Alriiight, you're still cute. But I'd say you were cuter when you were smaller" Cynthia teases, rather ironically you think to yourself.

"Say, Ethan. Sorry to be a bother, but since you're standing up can you go inside and get us something to drink?" Mom asks you.

You groan, you didn't really come out here to do requests. "Sure." You relent.

"Thanks sweetie" Your mom smiles, returning to lying down.
"Yeah, thanks sweetie." Cynthia adds, putting on her best 'sweet' voice.

You realise that this is your chance, neither of the women are looking at you, and they don't expect you to be back in a bit so you have some time to properly shrink yourself. From your spot behind Mom's chair, you pull out the remote and point it at yourself.

"Be right back." You say as you hit the blue button.

"Okay hun." Mom says, speaking over the sound of the remote activating.
15112.title: Putting the plan into action

choices: You start running to your mom's feet
You take off towards Cynthia's chair
One of your sisters walk out to talk to the women!
151121.content:
You're overwhelmed with blindness as a a bright light takes over your vision. This is it, the point of no return. No matter what happens next, you'll be shrunk when it happens. You feel a rush overcome you as you experience a dropping sensation that makes you feel nauseous. Hopefully it doesn't make you feel that way when you make yourself big again after you have your fun. Eventually, the white fades, and you no longer feel sick either. You look down at the remote and it reads 26%, a surprising amount of charge used but you should have enough in a while, or even enough for a quick burst now should the worst happen.

*BOOM!*

Your thoughts are interrupted as you're startled by a loud crashing noise. You're entire body shakes with the ground in the aftershock of the quake. What could have caused that? You look around to investigate... And then your eyes widen as you realise what the source was.

"I HOPE HE DOESN'T TAKE TOO LONG, IT'S GETTING KINDA WARM OUT HERE" Thunders the voice of what appears to be Cynthia, or what you assume, from what you can tell from the sonic booms that was her voice. Another *BOOM!* occurs, shaking you to your core, and that's when you realise the source to that too. It's the sounds coming from your Mom's feet fidgeting in her sandal! But it's so far away, how small are you to be able to feel these shocks?

"I'M SURE HE'LL BE BACK SOON." Your Mother's equally booming voice reassures Cynthia.

You feel very intimidated at the moment. You didn't expect them to be this huge and imposing when you went out to shrink! And the feeling is doubled as there are two gigantic women lounging in chairs miles above you! You can see Cynthia leaning back in her chair, your vision of her slightly blurred and distorted due to the extreme distance. You look up, but can't see your mother, only the back and underside of the chair containing her now gargantuan mass.

You take another look around, trying to scale yourself more accurately before you approach. The surface is generally pretty flat, albeit with several bumps that are nearly impossible to notice if you weren't really small to see them. You see a large boulder nearby and walk up to check. The Boulder is huge! It's about three times your height! You wager that this is one of those small pebbles that always get everywhere or stuck in shoes, before moving on. But unknown to you was that you were wrong, what you actually examined was a single grain of sand that fell from Cynthia's foot earlier.

You have a bit of a trip ahead of you, and you only have so long before they get suspicious of you disappearing and most likely investigate, so you better make tracks now.
151121.title: Plan Successful!

choices: You approach her to climb.
You mom comes back and brings a drink to Cynthia, crushing or whisking you away.
Cynthia decides it's too hot and walks to go in your house, leaving you stranded
The remote flies back like a boomerang in the wind, everthing is all good.
Something else.
1511212.content:
Even though your Mom is closer, you decide to make your way to Cynthia. It would just feel too weird to spy on your own mom, even if she objectively would look better to other men who weren't related to her. You make the long trek towards Cynthia's chair that is miles upon miles away. Luckily for you, the women are talking about something that makes them temporarily forget about the request they gave you. Unfortunately for you, this conversation creates unintentional chaos during your travels. The women's voices are so loud as they are enthusiastically laughing and you damn near have to cover your ears to stop the noise from shattering your ear drums. You never realized how much your mom moves her feet while talking, lifting her sandal-encased foot up just a few inches off the ground before tapping down causes cataclysmic events that make your legs buckle underneath you as you fall to the ground.

It's been several minutes now and at this point you are starting to be able to actually see your mom's full body as you get further ahead of her chair. Even though she is closer than Cynthia, you have a hard time even making out her facial features due to the vast distance from how high above she is to you. Meanwhile the slightest breeze blows outside, this breeze is like a strong hurricane gale at your size. Your body is forced against one of the many boulders that range from the size of houses to large enough to crush warehouse complexes. In other words, a grain of sand stops you from being whisked away like dust.

"Hey, where are those drinks? Did Ethan get lost?" Cynthia's voice thunders from the distance with an echo distorting it to it barely being intelligible.

"Wow, I almost forgot! It has been awhile ago. I'm going to smack him if he's doing something else." Your mom's voice bellows even louder from behind you being that she is closer.

With a loud grunt, your mom shocks you as she lifts her body from the lawn chair, it's fibers and frame making a high pitch squeal from the massive weight being released from it. Miles upon miles above you now stands your once petite, and slightly pudgy mother is now a cosmic goddess to you that you have to strain your neck all the way back to see the tip top of her blurry features. Anything past the bottom of her well-worn, black sandals are is so difficult to make out.

"Just a moment, I'll get us some drinks myself", Your mom scolds with frustration before stepping away from the chair and towards the house.

The first step of the titaness sends the sole of her sandal careening above you to block out all light as you can't help but scream out in fear. Under the sandal, you can make out dirt and grime that would engulf city blocks, the crushed carcass of an ant bigger than Godzilla, and plenty of large, boulder-sized grains of sand that fall around you like hail. Somehow you are lucky enough not to be crushed by the rain of sand before the sandal moves away faster than the speed of sound and crashes to the ground.

BOOOOOOOOOOOOM!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Miles away, your mom's foot lands and she continues her walk towards the house. Each step she takes as she gets further away makes less of an audible boom and intense earthquake before she is finally in the house and you are left in a relatively peaceful environment consisting of you and Cynthia still sitting in her chair miles away. Knowing this is your chance to get to Cynthia without the loud voices and disruptive earthquakes caused by your mom's feet, you use your athleticism to run towards Cynthia with full speed as you hope your mom uses the time in the house to do things other than just get drinks so she will take more time before sitting back down.

As you get closer to Cynthia, she gets bigger and bigger causing you to subconsciously slow down as you start to become disheartened from approaching this increasingly intimidating giantess. With you finally closer to her chair than your mom's, it is crystal clear that she is way bigger than Mom. Really, at six feet tall, Cynthia is bigger than the average guy at normal sized. If your mom is a cosmic mass like the Moon, then Cynthia is the Earth. The first thing you notice is her large barefeet, as she lives only next door, she did not bother wearing shoes to walk to the backyard. Her feet are wide and all-encompassing with long, slender toes compared to your Mom's. Although her feet look older and less taken care of with callouses, dry skin, and chipping red polish; they would still be incredibly sexy if you weren't so scared right now. Looking past the throbbing veins on top of her feet, you follow up her impossibly long legs covered in denim capris to her black t-shirt to the facial features that you can barely make out and finally her short, blonde hair. The neighbor that you once found jokey and slightly annoying is now an intimidating goddess and you can't help but realize how silly it is to be so scared of her.

At this point, you went from running towards her to walking slowly as your legs tremble. You are still miles away but feel you basically met your objective. She is so tall that you fear getting any closer and she might just stretch her legs a little forward or slump back in her chair and you'd have to run for your life from her massive, middle-aged feet. You think you may have seen enough for today and would like to grow back now. Perhaps next time you use the remote you'll be more bold to get closer. Although you know you need to get a safe distance away where the women won't be able to see you before growing back, you decide to at least check the remote to see the charge. As you pull it out your pocket, another breeze outside blows. Once again it is like a hurricane and you are forced to hold onto a nearby boulder for cover, but not before the remote is blown from out your hand! You watch in horror as the remote is blown up towards Cynthia's body and you see it turn into a barely noticeable dot before completely disappearing as it floated somewhere between the bottom of her black shirt or the top of it due to the remote blending in with the shirt.

You start to have a mini-panic attack. Without that remote, you are stuck at somewhere between speck and microscopic sized. If you want any hope at survival or a normal life, you need to get to Cynthia! Now you have no choice but to get closer...
1511212.title: Cynthia the Goddess

choices: Your mom comes back outside
Cynthia decides to head inside!
Cynthia feels something!
15112121.content:
You don't really have much of a choice here. Despite every part of your body warning you to stay as far away from Cynthia as your tiny body could possibly go, the reality of your situation was that if you didn't climb her and fast, you'd lose the only way to restore yourself back to regular size, leaving you permanently at a microscopic size!

For a moment you picture what the rest of your life would be like at this size. You'd probably be kept in a shoebox or container of some kind, where your mom and sisters could keep an eye on you and take care of you without harming you. Of course, this scenario would involve you being found, rather than the far more likely scenario of you being splattered underneath Cynthia's feet without her ever knowing.

You shake your head, trying to clear those thoughts out of your head, as well as to try and shake away the nerves keeping you from approaching the impossibly huge mature woman any further. Nervously, you take a step forward, then another step. Alright. You can do this! You begin to formulate a plan as Cynthia grows ever larger with each step you take.

In the end, you couldn't really come up with anything concrete, there were too many variables out of your control. The best plan you have at the moment is just 'Climb up her foot and leg, and hope you don't get killed trying it'. It doesn't exactly give you confidence, but you have no choice if you ever want to become anything other than a speck for the rest of your life.

You slow down again as you begin your final approach to Cynthia's foot. Remarkably it's been mostly still, only knocking you over with tremors from subconscious wiggles a couple of times. You don't know how it's been since your mom left, but you feel like if she comes back at this point the foot will become a lot more active and infinitely more dangerous. You can't tell what Cynthia is doing or planning, since from this perspective all you can see of her is a colossal foot spanning more than a dozen city blocks, attached to a leg that stretches on into the sky for what seems like forever, reaching the heavens that was about one foot off the ground in actual measurements. You take a big gulp and run for the ball of her foot.

You stumble a few times on approach from the tremors caused by her toes bouncing up and down, and the air around you grows a lot more humid and musty, but you deal with it and press on. You leap forward and stretch your arms out in an attempt to grab on when you get close. Fortunately you do so with little issue, your right hand finding an easy grip between some of her wrinkles, and your left hand pulling you up after pushing down on some dried skin hanging off her foot.

The wall of flesh that is Cynthia's foot goes on for seemingly forever, so you can't really tell what part of her foot your clinging to. You were aiming for the ball of her foot, but all you know is that you aren't near her toes, otherwise you'd probably have been smashed underneath them or grinded between them by now. Pressing your ahead against the skin, you can very clearly hear blood rushing through the nearby veins, again rubbing in how small you are to be able to hear something like that clearly. Wincing, you begin to quickly scamper up Cynthia's foot before something can happen.

You were nearing the peak of Mt. Foot when...
15112121.title: An impossible climb?

15112122.content:
You're completely paralysed with a mixture of indecision and fear. You know that you have to climb this towering middle-aged woman that used to be your neighbour, but her sheer size has left you so intimidated that you just can't bring yourself to move any closer! Not to mention the very real possibility of being crushed without a trace while trying to climb up the titanic, fidgeting feet, which are your only way up Cynthia's body!

BOOOOOOOOMM!!

You're suddenly thrown off your feet by a cataclysmic and violent earthquake, knocking you to the ground. You groan to yourself as you get covered in small scrapes from hitting the harsh ground like that, and look around for the source, though the familiar booming noise has already alerted you to what it is.

Exiting back out through the house was the colossal form of your mother, who had returned a lot quicker than you had originally thought she would! You still can't make out too many details past her toes, especially not when she's this far away from you, but you can see her carrying....something in her hands. It's probably the drinks but you can't say for sure.

"I'm baaaaaackkk!" Your Mom's deafening voice thunders around in a sing-song voice, as her colossal legs start to move her closer to you with terrifying speed and power, each step a more intense crash and earthquake than the last. But you should be okay, you're closer to Cynthia now, and she's just heading back to her chair...

Is what you thought, until she stepped right past it.

"What!? But why would she...?" Are the thoughts that run through your head, but you don't have time to think of an end to these thoughts as the same familiar shadow as before looms over you. You look up and your knees buckle at the sight of the bottom of your Mom's sandal, covered in dirt and dust, and you noted, an extra crushed ant than when you last saw it. It must have been stepped on when she was in the house.

The never ending wall of sandal grows larger and larger, or more accurately closer and closer, and you realise that this time there will be no miracle dodge. It's gonna step right on you! You finally move your legs, you need to get away! But the fear of this situation overcomes you, as your legs give out and you fall over barely after you began to move. You look up at your impending doom, and hopelessly put your hand up.

"MOM! NOOOOOO!"
____________________________

"Here you go!" Kathy said, handing a drink to her friend, before spinning around on one foot and heading back to the chair she was seated at before.

"Aw, you didn't have to come over here! I could have reached you from here!" Cynthia said, thanking her.

"Nonsense! You're the guest, so I should be polite!" Kathy said with a laugh, putting her feet up.

"Well, I won't say no!" Cynthia laughed back. "Did you see Ethan when you went in there?"

Kathy's face turned to a frown.
"No I didn't! That boy sometimes, he disappears when you need him the most! Why did he even tell us he would get them!?" She vented.

Cynthia shrugged.
"Who knows? Men, huh?" Then, something caught her eye. "Hey, K? You've got bugs stuck to your shoe."

"Huh? Ugh! Gross! I hate bugs!" Kathy yelled, looking at the bottom of her sandal to confirm. And sure enough, there were a couple of ants squashed flat, as well as a small red splat, but it was too small for her to notice. Huffing, she went back to relaxing.
"Well, serves them right! If they didn't want to get squashed they shouldn't have been underfoot!" She declared.

Cynthia shrugged again.
"Yeah, I guess you're right." She confirmed, and the two of them continued their conversation from before.
15112122.title: Joining the under-sole gang

choices: You are able to steer the seed towards an open window on your house.
You can't control the steering of the seed and end up floating to another house!
You can't control the steering of the seed and float to a nearby park/elsewhere.
Something else.
15112123.content:
You were feeling brave at first in your quest to get the remote back from the giga-sized neighbor but as you closed in from a few miles away or less than a foot at normal size, she was becoming too intimidating to take another step. There were just too many factors that discouraged you from your plan. For one, it is apparent that as you get closer, it will be nearly impossible to climb Cynthia. You're pretty sure that the tiny ridges in her toes as so big and deep that you could get stuck inside them like a canyon. Perhaps you can get lucky and find some pieces of dry skin to hold onto and climb up her but even her smallest toe is like a mountain that I would consider myself to be successful to climb if I were normal sized and scaled something proportionate to it. Nevertheless, I'd still have to make my way up the toe I scale and onto her foot before finding out how to climb her legs that extend for miles above. In the meantime, I'd have to hope that Cynthia decides to sit in one place and talk to my mother for most of the day until late at night because that's how long it would take to reach her shirt if I climbed nonstop without rest, which would be impossible for the most fit climber. Of course, any movement that Cynthia makes would most likely be too intense to keep hold of her and would send me falling into a splat on the pavement or wherever she walks to. But hey, if I'm fortunate enough to make it to the shirt, I can then try to spend the next few hours finding the remote among the folds and crevices of fabric, if it didn't fall off her to be lost forever.

Lastly, the biggest issue with climbing Cynthia is that you didn't realize just how much people idly move their feet. A slight, lazily flex of her titanic toes lifts them thousands of feet in the air before they come down to make the ground quake, not to mention the chaos caused when she occasionally taps her foot. Cynthia leans back on her chair and starts rubbing her feet along the pavement, allowing the rocky and rough ground to act as a file for her callused soles. To you, the feet move back and forth alternatively as speeds that nearly make them a blur. The scraping noises from gestures were earsplitting and a gust was generated from the movement that made you cower to the ground, almost as if you were praying to the massive goddess to stop. The middle aged woman cared nothing of the plight of the ants at her feet, nevertheless the specks of dust as she continued to massage her soles against the ground for a little longer before lifting them up to allow the air to cool them down from the friction heat.

You slowly got up from the ground to look at a debris field of dry skin that could blanket many homes at once singularly. Cynthia's wide soles and long toes raised to reveal her expansive soles with a mixture of new pink skin and dusty white, callus as a visible wave of heat dissipated from under them before she allowed her feet to slam down, creating a shock wave that sent flakes of skin, boulder-sized rocks, and silt flying away like dust in the wind.

Meanwhile the sun above compared with your fear and stress had you pouring sweat as your tiny size made you much more susceptible to the temperature but you aren't the only one getting afflicted by the sun. Cynthia started having small amounts of sweat that weren't enough to form droplets but definitely made parts of her skin moist. Even though her friend has only been gone for a few minutes and should be back anything now, she decides she will just meet her inside and they can catch up in the air conditioning. Cynthia rises up from her chair, creating even more havoc on the supports of the lawn chair than your Mom did when she got up earlier. At six feet tall, Cynthia was already much taller than your usually petite mother but at your tiny size, she is so tall that craning your head all the way back to make out any discernible figure of blurry colossus just puts your neck in pain and shatters your equilibrium as you start getting dizzy. That's when you see Cynthia's left foot move at a bewildering speed as it travels miles ahead in less than a second to reach miles to the side of you, enough to make your legs collapse from the resulting Boooooooooooooooooooom and earthquake associated.

That's when you see Cynthia's right foot move and you are right in front of it! "Shit!" You scream out before uselessly getting up to run as Whoooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooosh!

The massive sole swings from far above as it blots out almost all light and temporarily becomes a sky to you that spans for miles. You barely get a look at the view of blurry landscape above you before Cynthia's foot lands just behind your position with her cracked heel crashing onto the ground to create a deafening BOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOM and the displaced air sends you sliding against the ground like the debris from earlier. Bloody scrapes and scratches line your body from sliding against the rough terrain at high speeds before your back collides against a dumpster truck-sized flake of dry skin left over from Cynthia, shielding you from a deadly impact with a massive, boulder-sized grain of sand behind it.

Meanwhile, Cynthia casually walks away. Each of her powerful steps becoming less intense with the increasing distance as she makes her way to the back door.

BOOOOOOOOOOOOOOM, Boooooooooooooom, booooooooom, booooom, boom!

As Cynthia disappears out of sight, you slowly get up and grasp your aching left shoulder before looking around to see that you must have been flung very far away. The lawn chairs are much further in the distance than before and you are now closer to the edge of the backyard cement pad where you are met with an infinite jungle of grass which would resemble trees in a forest if the trees could be taller than skyscrapers. From here, you can hear alien-like sounds of clicks and shrieks from the dense forest as it is a battleground and wilderness of gigantic bugs preying and mating in an endless cycle. Having Mom and Cynthia around allowed you to be relatively safe from the bugs since you were near them but now that you are out alone, you are noticing more activity. A fly the size of a blimp hovers from high above to cast a shadow over you before flying at supersonic speed away. You didn't realize that this was just a tiny fruit fly.

You find yourself wishing that you didn't slow down when trying to get to Cynthia. You would've ended up being crushed by the giant neighbor but that would be better than you current fate to either die in the increasing heat of the sun from dehydration or be eaten by an insect. It's not like you can just travel back inside, it would take days to reach the house and a small step that leads to the backdoor would be like a miles high cliff to you. Going to another neighbor's house would take even longer and in the grass forest death is assured. Before you can start sobbing in hopelessness, another shadow is cast over you causing you to look up to see a dandelion seed float away from far above. You then realize that it came from a dandelion plant that somehow survived the weed eater and your Mom pulling them! You can climb up the dandelion and use the seeds as a way to travel!

It seems so simple but once again as you get closer to the "treeline", the dandelion grows bigger as you see that it would not be unlike climbing a skyscraper.... nope, now that you're closer it's even taller, much taller. It would take hours to climb the stem but even that is much faster than any alternative out there. You continue your trek to the plant when you see something out the corner of your right eye. You look to see a gigantic, brown spider that is crawling right towards you! You start sprinting away from the monstrous creature but you seem to be gaining no distance as the massive monster gets closer with its body increasing in size to reveal its beady, black eyes. Within seconds, a shadow is cast over you causing you to fall on your back and look up to see the warehouse complex-sized spider scuttle right over you as its long legs take it high into the air with its hardened carapace feet causing the ground to vibrate as it moves past you without paying you any mind. The tiny, baby spider moves quickly to find a safe space from the bigger predators not caring about particles too small to activate its hunting instincts. Even to the tiniest bugs, you are basically nothing. You weren't sure if it was reassuring or even scarier but you know that there are tiny insects than this spider that you would not be so unfortunate to go unnoticed.

At the edge of the cement patch, you look up at the looming grass and the dandelion plant that is even taller as it stretches miles above with more seeds blowing off of it. Although the edge of the cement patch is like a cliff that would lead to a deadly drop to the base of the grass, the plant is close enough to be touching the cement. You walk to the thick, stem and grab hold of white hairs on the stem like they are ropes. Slowly but surely you make your climb to the very top, taking several breaks along the way as you get higher and higher above the cement patch to give you an excellent view of the backyard except for the watering can and bucket you can now make out nearby that tower over the dandelion. The winds feel stronger and you are careful to keep tight grip as you reach the summit of the dandelion to grab a hold of the wood-like ridges of the nearest dandelion seed head with its parachute hairs beginning to flap in the growing wind. Ready to glide, I push my body to make the dandelion seed move but nothing happens. I am too light to influence the seed and am stuck latching on miles above until the wind picks up to remove the seed and send me flying away!
15112123.title: All Alone

choices: ...sitting in bed and talking to her friend
...doing exercise on the floor
reader's choice
1512.content:
You thought about it a few times and finally, you decided to infiltrate your older sister's bedroom and see what she's up to. Many years ago, Jacqueline was always mocking you just for being shorter than her and you think this is might finally your chance to make fun of her when you shrink and do something mischievous to her while she isn't looking.

Using your newly-found remote, you aimed it on yourself and pressed the blue button.

BRRRRRZZZTTTT!!!!!

After that, you soon found yourself in a new world.

You were standing on a plain of carpet fiber and right in front of you was the towering form of the door leading to your older sister's bedroom. The fibers all go pass your shoulder and almost reach your head but nonetheless, you were able to see what's ahead. "Here we go!" you said and trek your way to your desired location.

You have bit of difficulty walking past the fibers as you constantly have to push several of them to get through. After all of that, you finally made it to Jacqueline's room...or at least underneath her door.

You could see your sister is...
1512.title: Jacqueline's Room

choices: The park
The beach
The mall
1513.content: You thought it over and decided to not bother your mother or sister. But instead text your girlfriend about meeting up somewhere to show her the shrink remote and maybe have a shrunken adventure with her. So you pull out your phone and begin texting her, you send a message saying you have a surprise to show her. She replies asking what is it, but you send a message back saying to just meet you at....
1513.title: Text Bianca about meeting up

choices: The Food Court
The Bench you shared your first kiss
Victoria's Secret
15133.content:
You send a quick message to Bianca asking her to meet you at the mall. You figure it would be an interesting place to show off the shrink ray after all, besides Bianca had always been a fan of people watching. You quickly pick a place in the mall though Bianca says she is going to be a bit on the late side. She has some work to finish up, but as soon as she was she'd head right over. You don't mind waiting a bit just saying you were looking forward to seeing her and showing off your little surprise.

You head to the mall pushing past crowds of people of all ages, colors, sizes, and more. You pass by stores, benches, shops, all while making your way to your meet up with Bianca. You check your phone, you still have well over an hour to kill before she is suppose to get there. You look up to find yourself at your meeting point.
15133.title: The mall

choices: Jacqueline (And she knows its a size remote.)
Emily (Does she know its a size remote?)
Naomi (She must be thinking that remote is a toy?)
152.content:
You enter in your room to check if your size remote is fully charged, but it's gone! You gasp in shock and wonder where did it go? Until you hear someone enter in your room behind you.

You turn and see _______ with the remote aimed at you!
152.title: The thief sister

choices: You rush her, but she shrinks you anyway!
You rush her, and get the remote back!
You stood there too long! Time to Shrink!
1521.content:
As you stare at your now empty drawer, you can feel a presence behind you. You turn around to see your older sister Jacqueline, with the remote in her hands! You're not sure why she was digging around in your room for, but it's not going to end well if you let somebody else who doesn't know about the remote use it! Especially when she has it pointed at you!

"H-Hey, Jacqueline....did you need something?" You ask her, trying to act casually in the moment.

Jacqueline's facial expression doesn't change.
"Where did you get something like this?" She directs a question at you instead, indicating at the remote.

"L-like what?" You answer, playing dumb.

"Like this remote that shrinks things." She says with force. "And don't act like it doesn't, I've already tried it on your desk."

You turn to look at your desk, or at least you would but it's gone! You definitely fixed it before you left, so Jacqueline must have hit it with the remote a second time! If that's the case, then her pointing the remote at you just got a lot more dangerous! She couldn't be planning to hit you with it could she? Regardless, you decide to answer the question and stall for time, until you can think of a way out of this.

"I don't know, it kinda just appeared on my desk when I woke up this morning." You answer.

Jacqueline sneers.
"Yeah right. You probably got this somewhere and planned to use it for something creepy didn't you?" She accuses. While not entirely off base, you definitely didn't plan this! If she shrunk you thinking you were bad this'd go from bad to worse!

"No! I'm being serious! I haven't seen it before today!" You shout, but at a volume where the rest of your family wouldn't hear the commotion.

"Don't bother, I know that's a lie." She cuts you off angrily. "Maybe I should just give you what you wanted." She threatens, re-aiming the remote.

This is bad! If you don't do something she's going to hit you with the remote! You try to think of something to say to convince her but it might be too late! You're not sure how charged the remote is, especially since it's already been used again, but maybe it doesn't have enough power and you can get the remote back if you charge at her before she gets a chance to use it?

What's the plan?
1521.title: Held at 'Gun' point

choices: She looks for you, to take you back to her room!
She leaves you there!
Mom comes in, wondering what the ruckus is
15213.content:
Neither of you have moved, and you're still thinking of a way to get out of this situation with your size still intact. However, while you were lost in thought, Jacqueline spoke up.

"You know what..." She says, trailing off ominously, which can only mean negative things for you. Something else that means something negative is the fact that she just pressed the button, firing the remote at you!

"Wai-" Is all you can manage to get out before you get enveloped in a blinding white light. Dammit! You should have done something! Anything! Now all you can do is try not to be sick as your stomach drops and your blood runs cold, afraid of what will await you when your vision returns.

Eventually, your vision does return, and it's like you've awoken on a whole new planet. Towering trees that you can only assume used to be your carpet surround you in every direction. You cough at the layer of dust around you as well, too small and far away for your mother's vacuum to reach. Your heart races faster and faster as it sinks in just how small you are. You are impossibly tiny, borderline microscopic!

And then, a sound rings out that (if it was possible) would have made your blood run even colder than before.

"Hmmph." A thunderous voice rings out. It doesn't take a genius to figure out who that voice belongs to. You turn towards the direction you remember facing when your vision returns, and your jaw drops. Your older sister, who was already pretty tall to begin with, is absolutely HUGE! And your so far away from her! You don't want to imagine what it would be like to be right next to her.

Suddenly, she speaks again.
"Well, that'll stop you from doing anything weird." she starts. "I could just leave you here to get eaten by a bug or stepped on by mom or something, but maybe I should just take care of you now." She ponders aloud. Then, for emphasis, she raises her right foot what seems to be miles into the sky, before slamming it down at full speed. A huge earthquake booms across the area as everything shakes, causing you to grab onto the carpet for balance. If she's that powerful at this distance, you don't want to be anyway near her at all!

"Although looking for you would be a pain, I don't even know where you are." She says. "Hmmmm...." She mumbles, weighing her options.

You're very worried about what the giant Jacqueline will decide to do. Like it or not, you need her to get back to normal size, so being close to her is ideal, but who knows what she'll do to you if she decides to look for you?

In the end....
15213.title: Horrible reaction speeds

choices: She doesn't believe you, and fires it at you!
She believes you, and gives it back
She believes you, but fires anyway!
1523.content:
You quickly spin to turn towards your door, and breathe a sigh of relief at the sight of just your youngest sister Naomi. Phew! You were worried it'd be mom or Jacqueline, considering that they already noticed you were acting weird during breakfast, but you should be able to act normally around Naomi.

"What's up? Did you need something Naomi?" You ask, trying to act as cool as possible.

Naomi's face looks troubled.
"Hey, big bro? What's this thing?" You nearly fall over in shock as she produces your missing size remote from behind her back! She took it?! Does that mean she was snooping around your room?

"W-where did you find that?" You ask, quickly losing composure.

"I found it in your drawer. Why were you hiding it? Mom said that we shouldn't keep secrets from each other." Naomi replied. The situation seemed to get worse and worse. If she showed Mom then there was no chance of you getting a chance to you the remote! You had to try and convince her to give it back to you!

"N-no! I wasn't trying to keep it secret, I was just keeping it safe! It's pretty dangerous, so you should probably give it back.." You trail off as you reach out your hand, hoping that Naomi will just go along with it.

But she doesn't, she holds the remote slightly tighter.
"I'll give it back if you tell me what it does." She says, standing firm.

You sigh, it'll probably be easier to just tell her the truth and get the remote back. The whole thing sounds pretty unbelievable so it doesn't matter if she thinks you're lying, as long as you get it back.

"It's a remote that shrinks things. I tried it out on my desk earlier and it got really tiny. I don't know if it works on people so I was keeping it hidden in my room." Not entirely accurate, but close enough to the honest truth.

Naomi doesn't say anything, only standing there, thinking.

What does she do?
1523.title: No, it's not a toy!

choices: She finds you!
She can't see you, and runs to get help!
She can't see you, and leaves!
15231.content:
You weren't expecting this reaction, but Naomi's face darkens, and a frown quickly grows on her face. You aren't sure what you did, but you angered her! That's not good!

"I'm not a little kid! You don't have to lie to me Big Bro!" She yells at you.

You wave your arms frantically. "No no! It's the truth! I swear!" You plead.

Naomi shakes her head. "Nuh uh! You're just saying something stupid so you can make fun of me for believing you!" She accuses.

You try to plead your case again, but before you get the chance....

"Take this!" Naomi cries, hitting the blue button on the remote.

"Naomi, Don't-!" Is all you could get out in time.

BRRRRRZZZZTTTTT!!!!!

You experience sensory overload, as your entire body feels sick, and your vision is blinded temporarily. When you get your composure back, you're in a very different environment to your bedroom.

"H-Huh? B-Big Bro?" A voice booms out, and your stomach drops.

You look up, and your mouth immediately hangs open at the sight of Naomi. She's incredibly huge! Or more accurately you're incredibly tiny! You can't be more than a fraction of a centimetre tall, and your size in comparison to the carpet around you only backs that up!

Naomi, who froze in shock for a moment, looks at the remote, before darting her head back to where you were before. Her eyes widen. "Oh no!" She cries out, before quickly crashing down on her knees, with an impact that sends you flying!

Naomi crawls forward, frantically looking through the carpet for any sign of you. "W-Where are you bro? I-I'm sorry!" She stammers out.

How does her search go?
15231.title: It was an accident!

choices: "All right, I'll grow you back"
"I don't think you're in a position to demand anything brother"
"Yeah, sure. But only after we play something first!"
152311.content:
Naomi was all fours crawling on the floor, looking very carefully. Thankfully, this means she was able to find you.

With her mouth open she says: "Wow! Bro! you are very small!"
Moving her fingers in close, Naomi picks you up, as gently as the huge difference in size allows.

Still, you feel the pressure of Naomi's fingers, with enough force to crush you, you scream out from the pain.
"Naomi! Watch out!" You shout out, but unsurprisingly, she could not hear you.

Still astonished, Naomi investigates you, closely observing just you how small you were.
You were at most 1/4 inch tall, very tiny!

Naomi then giggles.
"Brother, I could crush you like an ant, just by squeezing my fingers!" She said, laughing. Almost to sell this point, she playfully squeezed your body, which this time came very to close to actually crushing you.

A wave of fear from being carelessly crushed by your little sister takes you. You begin to get desperate and start screaming.
Naomi somehow seemed to realise that you wanted to say something, so she moved her hand as close to her ear as she could get, in an effort to hear you better.

" Naomi! Grow me back! Now!" You shout out to her.

How does Naomi respond to you?
152311.title: She finds you!

choices: Play with you
Get up and leaves you
Has more fun with the remote and you
15233.content:
"Really?" Naomi says, looking at the remote before having a idea. A smile started to form on her face that made you nervous.

"Naomi don't --" You know what she is thinking and try to talk her out of the idea. Unfortantly, it was too late as your little sister aims the remote and fires it at you. In one quick flash, Naomi watch you disappeared from her sights.

You on the other hand, saw everything absurdly gigantic. The nearest thing near you was a penny that was on its side, and it felt like a mountain range to you. Before you can have a second to panic about you microscopic size, a powerful rumble could be felt before somethint massive lands just right behind you. You turn to see Naomi's foot, towering high above you.

"Tee hee, you are right big bro, this thing really does shrink things." Naomi says with a giggle as she looks down and can, surprisingly, see a very miniscule brother. She bends down to get a better look at how small her brother is to you. You fumble a bit, got very nervous as your younger sister's face looms over you before one of her pupil looks at you.

"Naomi, please grow me back." You shouted out loud to her, seeing that she still has the remote in her hand. Few seconds has past before you start to think she can't hear you.

"Wow, you look so small, bro." Naomi smiles as she is enjoying seeing you at such a small size. Your sister wonders what to do with you before deciding to...
15233.title: Might have been best not to tell her.....

152331.content:
"let's play a game bro. Hmm but what one, there are so many that you would be good at."
What game does she decide on?
1. Mountain climber- she has you climb her (or maybe another family member unaware)
2. Cave explorer- she makes you explore somewhere on her (ear, nose, butt, vagina, mouth)
3. Battle arena- she has you fight bugs she finds
4. Giant attack- she puts you in her Lego City and trys to crush you
5. Secret agents- she pretends your both undercover spy's
6. Hide and seek- you have to hide somewhere while she counts to 100
152331.title: What to play

choices: She goes to shrink your other family members!
She's going to shrink herself as well!
She's going to shrink you a second time!
152333.content:
"HEY BRO, CAN YOU CLIMB ONTO THAT PENNY? I WANNA PICK YOU UP BUT I MIGHT SQUISH YOU OTHERWISE." Naomi commands you, a grin plastered all over her face. She was clearly enjoying this, and you wern't too thrilled about that.

Still, the thought of her trying to pick you up with her fingers at this size terrifies you, so you oblige and head towards the towering penny. There isn't exactly any areas to grip on the way up, so you realise that you'll have to come up with some other strategy to climb up there.

"WOW. EVEN THAT LITTLE PENNY IS SO MUCH BIGGER THAN YOU." Naomi muses. You really weren't a fan of her commentary rubbing salt into the wound.
"SO WHAT'RE YA GONNA DO? I DON'T WANNA WAIT MUCH LONGER" Naomi booms from above. You can't really help it right now, but you know that you should try not to annoy or bore Naomi, or she might do something dangerous or potentially fatal to you. After looking around, you think of a plan, and walk towards one of the carpet fibres surrounding you.

You begin to climb up the fibre, feeling Naomi's gaze watching you, and hearing her breaths at the same time. When you get about halfway up she speaks up again.

"OH I GET WHAT YOU'RE DOING NOW. DON'T WORRY, LET YOUR 'BIG SIS' HELP YOU OUT!" Naomi teases, with a real smug tone in her voice. She's definitely power tripping over this situation.

As it turns out, Naomi's 'help' was to take one of her titanic fingers and slide the penny into position below you.
