Not taking account the impact of her movements however, she bumps the carpet fibre, knocking you off balance and causingyou to fall unexpectedly onto the penny. You'll be alright, but the fall onto a solid surface definitely wasn't pleasant.

"NO NEED TO THANK ME. NOW COME HERE." Clearly impatient, as no sooner after she finished saying this you're completely surround by Naomi's fingers as they grip the penny. Trying to keep it as flat as possible, she lifts the penny up, and stands to her full height at the same time. You, however, are encased in the darkness of her hand.

Suddenly, you again feel a falling sensation as the penny is released. You try your best to cling to the surface, but end up smacking your face on it when it abruptly stops falling. What you felt was Naomi dropping the penny into the palm of her other hand.

You look up, and rub the sore spot of your face. You see the familiar sight of your grinning sister. What does she plan to do next?
152333.title: In Dangerous hands

choices: At least no, but...
Yes. (This is a real nightmare or what!?)
1523332.content:
In your point of view in your new ant size, you can't really see what she is planning in her mind and neither what she will doing now since you can only watch helplessly her gigantic smiling face who looks like skyscraper to you!

Unaware to you, Naomi picks the remote with her other hands, points to herself and press on the trigger. In one flash, Naomi is shrunk down to your size! But do you shrink with her as well?
1523332.title: Is this a good idea?

choices: Someone suddenly enters the room
Naomi decides to explore other rooms of the house
Naomi wants to play a game with you at your current sizes (what could go wrong?)
15233322.content: "hey why are still tiny? Did the remote not work or something?" Naomi says as she stared down at you. She looked at the remote and aims at herself again before realizing that everything around her was huge. "Oh wow! I'd did work after all I guess it shrinks multiple people to" Naomi puts the remote into her pocket and wraps her fist around you as you feel her walking around. "Everything looks so cool from down here there are so many new hiding places for hide and seek!" Naomi says with childish glee as she moves around the room.
15233322.title: Ant to an ant

choices: Gives up and plays the shrink ray
Decides to tilt her hand and leave you in yoyr room
Ask someone to help her look for you
1523333.content:
"MY BIG BRO, YOU LOOK SOOOO TINY FROM HERE." Naomi says, smiling as she enjoys seeing you at the palm of her hand. "BUT YOU KNOW WHAT I THINK WOULD BE FUN?~" She says as you felt the world rumble a bit. Fear strikes you when you see the size remote aiming right at you. "LET'S SEE WHAT ANOTHER BLAST FROM THIS THING WILL DO TO YOU." Naomi says, smiling as she sets the device to the strongest setting.

"Naomi, no!" You shout out to your sister, but it was pointless as she made up her mind. Not wanting to be smaller, you ran as fast as your micro body would go, excrept it was a pointless attempt as you're still on the penny that is on the palm of your sister's hand.

The machine whines up a bit before bright light blinds you completely. Rubbing your eyes, you look around, trying to figure how small are you now. Its hard to tell, as you are still on a bronze surface. Apperently, the penny shrunk with you.

Suddenly the world shakes, much worse than before. You look up, only to see a black void starring at you. You were confuse for a bit until...

*BOOOOMMMMM*

The sky turn to a skin like color and the world boom. You realize that what you're looking at is the pupil of your sister's eyes, and the sonic boom was her blinking. Before, you could question anything, a indescribable noise deafen you.

Back to the normal size world...

"Wow, big brother, the remote shrunk you so much, i don't think i can see you." Naomi says says with glee, either clearly showing that she shows no concern of her brother's situation, or just doesn't understand the situation in general. The gleeful little girl continues to look for you, not knowing that you and the penny shrunk so much that you are in the prints of her palm.

She keeps looking until....
1523333.title: Shrinking Curiosity

choices: You grow back to your previous size
Naomi grows and you grow with her
Naomi grow but you stay the same size
15233331.content:
"Big Bro I can't find you! I'm just going to fire the shrink ray at the spot I last saw you."

You don't know if this is a good idea or not since the alternative would be that you're stuck on your gigantic little sister, but you can't tell her what to do anyway so you just hope everything turns out fine.

After Naomi sets the shrink ray to growing and fires at her hand...
15233331.title: Gives up and plays the shrink ray

choices: She still wants to play with you
She is going to take care of you
She is going to take care of you but is telling your family about the shrink ray
152333311.content:
You don't know how Naomi did it, but you are actually growing back to the size you were when you were shrunk for the first time.

"I can see you again! I have to remember this when I play hide and seek again, nobody will be able to find me!"

You once again realize that Naomi is not understanding how serious all of this is. She is way too young to hold such a powerful object. You start waving and shouting at her to signal her that you want to tell her something. To your own surprise it actually works and she holds her hand next to her ear so she can hear you.

"Naomi, can you grow me back to my normal size? We can play with the shrink ray again later, but right now is not a good time."

"Of course I can, give me a seco... Uh, what does the flashing red zero on the shrink ray mean?

The situation is worse than you thought. All the shrinking and growing took all the energy the shrink ray had and now it needs to recharge before you can grow back. And you still don't know how fast it charges, so you're stuck with your little sister for who knows how long. You quickly explain everything to Naomi and ask her to be very careful with both you and the shrink ray until you can grow back and that she should keep it a secret for now. After you're done Naomi moves her hand in front of her face and says that...
152333311.title: You grow back to your previous size

choices: She drops you off at a family member so you can "spy" on them
She let's you explore her room and her body
She invites friends over so they can play with you together
1523333111.content:
"Of course I'll be careful when we play our next game!"

Naomi still doesn't get how serious the situation is. You don't exactly know what Naomi's idea of careful is so you just have to see what awaits you and hope for the best.

What does Naomi have in mind?
1523333111.title: She still wants to play with you

choices: Your mother Kathy
Your older sister Jacqueline
Your younger sister Emily
15233331111.title: She drops you off at a family member so you can...

choices: The Kitchen, Kathy is cleaning the house. Naomi drops you on her body
Mom's bedroom, and hides you in an article of clothing
The living room, and she drops you on the couch next to Mom
152333311111.content:
"All right brother, as soon as the controller loads, I'll turn you back to normal." Naomi promises. But the grin on her face as she beams down at your microscopic body doesn't fill you with confidence.

"But first....."
And there it is. You think.
"...let's play a little!" Naomi shouts excitedly.

"The game is like this, I'll put you on some part of mom's body. Your mission is to survive!" She said with a giggle. "If you survive, I'll grow you back, if not, oh well! You'll be crushed by Mommy's body I guess! So, good luck!"

You want to argue against this, but even if she could hear you, Naomi's mind was made up. Hiding you on Mom's body? There's no way that could end well! You'll definitely end up lost or crushed, or worse! Before you can protest, Naomi takes you to...
152333311111.title: Your mother Kathy

choices: You find a small hole
The vacuum starts
15233332.content:
"oh well, have fun exploring big brother" with that Naomi tilted her hand upside down and walked out of your room with the remote. You were feeling so many emotions, fear, anger, worry, sadness that's when you heard something that you were hoping you weren't
"KIDS CLEAN UP YOUR FLOORS, IM VACUUMING" your mom was going to vacuum the house. AND YOU WERE THE SIZE OF DUST. This was bad you had to think of something, quick. But what could you do? That's when you heard the most deafening sound, the vacuum was on, your mom must be vacuuming the hallway, which means it won't be long till she gets to your room. You have a little bit of time, maybe if you can find a hole in the carpet you might survive the vacuum. You began your search for a small hole to climb into and hide when you heard your door open. "Ethan I swear" you turned around and saw your mother picking up clothes and other miscellaneous items off your floor words couldn't describe how big she was to you now. You snapped out of your awestruck daze and keep searching for somewhere to hide.
15233332.title: The floors not a good place for being microscopic

152333322.content:
You desperately looked around the surrounding area, but all you could see was just more empty space and bits of carpet towering above you. You had no plan, no shelter, and thanks to Naomi, you also had no remote! You start screaming. Doesn't she even realise that she's basically abandoned you to get sucked up by your Mom while she vacuums?

Suddenly, your blood runs cold as the noise you were dreading starts.

VRRRRRMMMMMMMMM!!!!!

All thoughts you had in your mind were drowned out by the deafening sounds of the cleaning appliance. Far above, absentmindedly holding the handle was your Mother, seemingly zoned out while she completes the housework. Not like you had a realistic chance of her finding you anyway. The ground shakes, and a decent breeze blows past you, no doubt being sucked into the depths of the vacuum. Your legs buckled slightly in fear.

And then, your Mom moved the vacuum forward.

You had almost no time to react. The noise from the vacuum increased even more than before, reaching a point that it blew out your eardrums. You clasped your hands to your head in an effort to stop this, but it was no use. Fortunately, you didn't have to endure this for long, as almost instantly your microscopic body was lifted up and sucked towards the vacuum at frightening speeds! You scream out as you see the black hole approaching, sucking you in further into its depths....
__________________

"Geez Ethan! Your floor is filthy!" Kathy said aloud, mainly to herself. "Who knows how many gross bugs and stuff like that is living in your carpet!" She murmured again, unaware of the irony of her statement, or to the fact that she had just filtered her son out of the very carpet she was cleaning.

Your body was never found, considering that it was mashed up and hidden within a mountain of dirt and dust inside a vacuum cleaner. And as for the remote, Naomi put it to the side in her room, and forgot about it. It never occurred to her the consequences of her actions.
152333322.title: Well this sucks

choices: Your mother
Jacqueline
Someone else
154.content:
Ironically, at an attempt to not make a scene you very awkwardly and suspiciously shuffle your way to your room.

As you approach your bedroom you notice something off, the door to your room is wide open; you never leave your door wide open, especially not when you're hiding something on the other side of it. You slowly inch towards the door frame as you poke your head into your room to see...
154.title: A family member is already in your room!

choices: "Mom, what are you doing in my room?"
"Hold on. Mom, do you know what that shrinking device is?"
Wait for her to respond
1541.content:
Your mother? Didn't she say she was going to clean the house? There's no way she's cleaning your room because first of all, it's not dirty, and secondly, if it was, she would never subject herself to that hell.

You sit there for a moment, silently staring at your mom, trying to discern what it is she's doing in your room. She seems to be inspecting your desk. She looks on top of your desk. She looks under your desk. She looks around your desk. She looks away from the desk. She looks at you. Shit! She's looking at you!

You should probably say something...
1541.title: Your mother

info.brief_description: A Shrinking story where you get REALLY small!
info.description:
FEEL FREE TO ADD SOMETHING IF YOU'D LIKE TO!

This is a story where our main protagonist finds a shrinking device, and when he uses it he (or his target) will always shrink to an incredibly small size. How small is up to you, but the maximum size will only be about a millimetre or two. But enough about that, let’s meet the girls that you’ll become a mere speck next to:

Ethan: You. Not much else to say really.
Feel free to just imagine yourself here :P

Kathy: Your mother. She’s kind, nurturing and loves you, but what will happen when your usually short mother becomes an ultra-tall goddess? Especially when she doesn’t like bugs…
She's about a head shorter than you, with shoulder length brown hair. She takes care of herself but is just on the verge of letting herself go. Her body proportions and measurements you would describe as 'above-average' for someone of her size. She enjoys relaxing more than she does doing work or chores, but she'll force herself to do them when she needs to.

Jacqueline: Your Older sister. She used to pick on you when you when you were younger but she focuses on your other siblings now. Maybe she just liked picking on those smaller than her…
She's fairly tall, approaching 6'1, and is in good shape, since she plays sports in her free time (I'll say Volleyball, but the sports not that important :P). She also has brown hair, but it's much longer, though usually tied back. Her frame is more toned, but she makes it work. She has a tendency to assume things, and is overly judgemental.

Emily: Your Younger sister. She’s still a teenager so she’s entering her rebellious bratty phase of adolescence. She’s a bit of a wildcard, who knows how she’d react to all of this…
Of all your sisters, Emily looks the most like a younger version of Kathy, even being the same height and sharing hair length and colour. Although she's a little thinner. She's a bit spoiled, despite not really getting preferential treatment that often, but does often complain about things not going her way. She's the laziest member of the family, which you can see when you look at the mess her room is.

Naomi: Your Youngest sister. She’s entering puberty soon, but she still enjoys playing games with her big brother. Although lately she’s been messing with the ants out in the garden…
Unlike everybody else, Naomi has black hair, that curls at the tips. Her dress sense seems to trend towards your style over your sisters, oddly enough. She's still young enough to be completely full of energy at all times, and can be tricky to control, especially with how stubborn she can get. This clashes with how carefree she is the rest of the time, so most of you just try to keep her happy. Due to her age, she's the shortest member of the family, being a little under 5 feet tall.

Bianca: Your girlfriend. You’ve been going out for a few years so she can usually come over to your house unexpectedly. Would it be better to let her know or keep her unaware?
Bianca's really short, only being 5'2, but she 'makes up for it in other areas' is what she usually says to you when you tease her about it. She has shoulder length black hair and fairly sizeable 'assets' as you might say. She usually wears sandals or shoes with large soles/heels to boost herself a little higher, and is usually the loudest person in the room.

Ashley: Your girlfriends best friend. She usually tags along whenever the two of you hang out. She’s a bit of a tease, mainly towards you.
Ashley rivals Jacqueline in height, which makes it look extra silly when she and Bianca hang out. Although she's much softer around the edges. The first thing you noticed when the two of you met was her ass, and you're fairly sure she knows, since she always wears tights or exercise pants whenever you're together, but you don't dare ask. She's got waist length blonde hair.

Cynthia: Your neighbour. She’s your mother’s age but you’re friendly enough to be on a first name basis. She usually visits to have chats with your mother.
Cynthia has short blonde hair, and is about 6ft. She's dressed the same way the entire time you've known her, which is just a t-shirt and either jeans or a denim skirt. 'It's my style', is how she defended it when you asked her once. Despite sharing ages, looks older than your mom, and even has a daughter of her own, but she's probably the second most playful woman you know (Next to Naomi).

And many more!

As for any ‘rules’, feel free to take the stories in any direction that you’d like, so long as the chapters are readable, a few sentences at least and follow along with the previous ones. I actually enjoy death so feel free to get our hero crushed, eaten or whatever else you can think of if you want that to happen. Go nuts!
